loans.name: Maria Eroina

texts.es:
Maria, una campesina llena de sueños y aspiraciones en su vida, quiere sacar adelante a su familia con el sudor de su frente. 

Por ello comenzó con su negocio de cría de cerdos, una profesión común en el municipio de Sonsón, donde no solo destaca el precio si no también la calidad de los cerdos que allí se crían. 

Maria solicita un crédito para la compra materiales para la adecuación de sus corrales, con el único objetivo de progresar y cuidar de su familia que es la que eleva su espíritu luchador y pujante. 

Con tu aporte Maria Podrá progresar en su negocio!
texts.en:
Maria, a farmer full of dreams and aspirations, wants to get ahead with her family by working hard. This is why she started raising pigs, a common activity in Sonsón, a municipality where not only the price but also the quality of the meat are famous.

María is requesting a loan to buy materials to repair her pig pens. Her only goal is to get ahead and take care of her family, who give her energy to continue fighting.

With your contribution, Maria will be able to get ahead with her business!

loans.use: to buy materials to repair her pig pens.

loans.name: Harold Enrique

texts.es:
El señor Harold desde muy joven se dedica a las funciones del campo tales como agricultura y cría de animales, actividades que le enseño su madre para que saliera adelante en su vida.

Hoy en día su actividad principal es la agricultura y la ganadería, tiene como objetivo mejorar su capital comprando algunos lotes de ganado que le permitan abastecerse y generar mejores ingresos, además desea arreglas los corrales en los que alberga sus animales y esta es la razón por la cual solicita un préstamo.

Es padre responsable y amoroso con sus hijos, vive en una finca con ellos y su esposa quien ha sido su más grande compañía.

Sueña con poder otorgarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad para que más adelante se puedan defender solos y sean independientes.

Todos los días asiste su negocio y procura por hacer las cosas muy bien y sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar podrá llegar muy lejos.
texts.en:
Since he was young, Harold has dedicated himself to rural functions like agriculture and livestock raising, activities that his mother taught him so that he could advance in life.

Harold's principal activity today is agriculture and cattle raising. His objective is to improve his capital, buying some lots of cattle to permit him to resupply his herd and to generate more income. In addition, he wishes to repair the corrals in which he keeps his livestock, and this is the reason he is soliciting a loan.

Harold is a responsible and loving father with his children. He lives on a farm with them and his wife, who has been his greatest companion.

He dreams of being able to offer his children a quality education so, later on, they can survive on their own and become independent.

Every day he works at his business and attempts to improve things. He knows that with the help of the Interactuar Corporation he can go very far.

loans.use: purchase some lots of cattle, permitting him to resupply his herd and generate more income.

loans.name: Zulma Evelyn

texts.es:
Zulma, de 32 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno año de educación básica, está casada, su esposo es albañil, también tiene un grupo musical junto con sus hermanos. Tienen 3 hijos los cuales aún están estudiando.

Zulma, se dedica a vender comida típica como enchiladas, tostadas de plátano, pupusas, yuca frita, papitas y panes en un cafetín, ubicado dentro de la escuela de la comunidad, ya tiene un año de vender en el cafetín. Inició vendiendo en su casa, luego vendió sus productos fuera de la escuela por 3 años, hasta que logró que le dieran permiso de vender dentro del centro escolar,  desde entonces su negocio ha ido prosperando.

Anterior a éste préstamo, ella ya habia solicitado otro crédito para comenzar su negocio en el cafetín y poder comprar los insumos principales.

Ahora Zulma, necesita el dinero para comprar un cafetín pequeño para vender panes hot-dog y así ofrecer un nuevo producto en la escuela, y también necesita en la compra de pan, salsas, yuca, papas, repollo, plátano, entre otros insumos para su negocio.

El sueño que tiene Zulma, es tener una pequeña empresa de venta de comida típica y aumentar sus ganancias para que sus hijos puedan gozar de mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Zulma, 32 years old, studied until the ninth year of basic education. She is married and her husband is a builder, who is also in a musical group with his brothers.  They have three children, who are all still in school.

Zulma sells typical food like enchiladas, plantain chips, pupusas (stuffed corn tortillas), fried yucca, potato dishes and breads in a cafeteria located in the community's school. She has been selling food in the cafeteria for a year. She began by selling out of her house and then she sold her products outside the school for three years, until she got them to give her permission to sell inside the school building. Since then, her business has prospered.

Before this loan, she had already requested another loan to start her business in the cafetería and to buy the initial supplies.

Now Zulma needs money to buy a small café to sell hot-dog breads, offering a new product in the school. She also needs to buy bread, sauces, yucca, potatoes, cabbage, plantains, and other supplies for her business.

Zulma's dream is to have a small business selling typical food and to increase her earnings so that her children can enjoy a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a small café to sell hot-dog breads, offering a new product in the school

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase goats to increase his flock.

loans.name: Precy

texts.en:
Precy is aged 42, married to a farmer, and blessed with four children. She owns and manages a retail store in their village and a tailoring business to generate additional income. Her net income on her two businesses is of great help to their daily expenses at home. 

Due to insufficient fund for her business she would like to get a loan amounting to PHP 25,000 to purchase bread, sugar and cooking oil to sell along with materials needed in her tailoring shop. She's hoping that her businesses will continue to improve and produce more income so that she can support the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase bread, sugar and cooking oil to sell as well as materials needed for her tailoring shop.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis, un hombre de 64 años, vive en el municipio de La Dorada, una pequeña ciudad donde las oportunidades de salir adelante son difíciles y la competencia comercial es bastante dura.

Este hombre de mente emprendedora y grandes deseos de salir adelante tiene el proyecto de iniciar con un negocio de venta de mercancía en el parque principal del municipio.

Con la ayuda de un préstamo, Luis podrá cumplir su sueño de ser independiente y poder generar sus propios ingresos, con los que sustentaría los gastos de su hogar.

El dinero será invertido en la compra surtido de ropa, zapatos, accesorios, entre otros.

Colabora a un hombre emprendedor, de mente creativa y grandes sueños!
texts.en:
Luis, a 64-year-old man, lives in the town La Dorada, a small city where opportunities of getting ahead are not easy and commercial competition is pretty tough. 

This man with an entrepreneur mind and big wishes of getting ahead has the project of starting a business selling merchandise at the main park of the town. 

With the help of a loan, Luis will accomplish his dream of being independent and generating his own incomes, with which he will pay his household expenses. 

The loan will be used to buy a variety of clothes, shoes and accessories, among others.

Help an entrepreneur man with a creative mind and big dreams!

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothes, shoes and accessories, among others.

loans.name: Gertrudes

texts.en:
Gertrudes is married, 52-years-old, with three children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard  working entrepreneur.

Gertrudes has a entertainment (sound system) business in the Philippines. Gertrudes requested a PHP 30000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her sound system.

Gertrudes has been in this business for 18 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance for her sound system.

loans.name: Helber

texts.es:
Helber desde que tiene memoria se dedica a la producción agrícola y diariamente se levanta para trabajar y atender sus tierras en las cuales tiene cultivos principalmente de papa.

Es una actividad aprendida a través de su padre y poco a poco ha ido perfeccionando sus técnicas y habilidades en este campo.

Adicionalmente genera ingresos alternos gracias a su trabajo como jornalero.
Hoy en día se siente orgulloso de lo que ha podido construir con su esfuerzo y se siente muy agradecido con la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva por las oportunidades que le brindan de progresar.

El pide un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de abonos, riegos y pesticidas, de este modo mantener sus tierras en optimas condiciones para los cultivos.

Su mayor sueño es tener una casa propia y allí poder disfrutar de su vida al lado de su esposa.
texts.en:
Ever since he can remember, Helber has been working in agriculture. He wakes up every day to work and take care of his land, in which he mainly grows potatoes. He learned this activity from his father and has improved his technique and skills step by step. He also works as a day laborer, which gives him an additional income.

He feels proud of what he has been able to achieve through his hard work and appreciates the opportunities that Corporación Interactuar and Kiva have given him to make headway.

He is requesting a loan to buy liquid and solid fertilizers, and pesticides. This will help him to keep the soil in optimal conditions for his crops. His bigger dream is to buy a house where he can enjoy life with his wife by his side.

loans.use: to buy liquid and solid fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna has one mission in life: to empower women. After being unable to work as a pediatric nurse after being injured, she decided to follow her dreams and make photography her full-time career. 

Anna specializes in boudoir and fashion photos. Her goal is to help women discover their beauty through the ultimate experience of professional photo shoots with makeup artists, hairdressers and wardrobe stylists.
  
She uses her photography talents to give back to the community and make women’s lives better. She started a foundation, Aubree's Angels, to honor her sister. After she was in a family photo shoot with her sister shortly before she passed away, she got the inspiration to help people through photography. Anna cherished these photos forever and she wanted to give that same feeling to other families.  She donates her time and experience to give people diagnosed with illnesses a free photo shoot with the goal of making memories that last a lifetime.  
  
Anna is going to use her Kiva loan to purchase new camera equipment so that she can expand her portfolio to photographing weddings.  

“I want women to feel beautiful and it is so meaningful to me that I get to help them find that beauty,” Anna states.

loans.use: to purchase new camera equipment so that she can expand her portfolio to photographing weddings.

loans.name: Aurelie

texts.en: Aurelie is 44 years old. She is married with five children aged between 12 and 19 years; all of them go to school.  She has a shop and has been in business for three years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, salt, and cooking oil for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more rice, salt, and cooking oil for sale.

loans.name: Francisco Luis

texts.es:
El trabajo del campo es una de las labores más difíciles hoy en día por el gran esfuerzo que se debe hacer para progresar, pero Francisco es un hombre que nunca se ha rendido a pesar del clima o las circunstancias que puedan pasar, el siempre está dispuesto a conseguir los recursos para su familia.

Se levanta desde primera hora de la mañana para desplazarse a distintas fincas para cumplir con sus obligaciones laborales. 

Este oficio lo alterna con la venta de leche que obtiene de sus propias vacas.
 
El desea aumentar su capital de trabajo para garantizar el sostenimiento de sus negocios y es esta la razón que la lleva a solicitar un préstamo con la Corporación Interactuar para invertirlo en la compra de una vaca lechera que le de un buen impulso a su negocio.

Mejora la vida de este colombiano con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Working in the countryside is one of the most difficult things nowadays, due to the hard work that is necessary in order to get ahead. But Francisco has not given up despite the climate or any other hurdle. He is always ready to provide for his family. He wakes up very early and visits different farms to fulfill his duties. He also sells milk from his own cows.

Francisco wants to increase his working capital in order to keep his businesses in good shape. This is why he is requesting a loan from Corporación Interactuar to buy a milk cow, which would give his business new momentum.

You can improve the life of this Colombian farmer with a loan!

loans.use: to buy a milk cow and give new momentum to his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To construct a zero-grazing unit

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.en: Jimmy, who used the previous loan to buy a groundnut pounding machine, and finish payment of his plot of land, lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. The machine he bought has increased his sales and profits. Jimmy has embarked on land expansion due the fact that his neighbours want to sell to him. His dream is to construct a good house for his family, despite challenges of high rent and license fees. Jimmy will use the loan to buy more land for family settlement.

loans.use: to buy  more land for family settlement.

loans.name: Naheed

texts.en:
Naheed, 48, lives with her family in Lahore. She has 3 sons and her husband sells electrical goods at a local market in Lahore. 

Her husband is quite experienced and has a good client base. He is honest and polite. His customers are mostly households and other small businesses like shops, restaurants etc. He is the only person earning wages in the family and the income that comes from the business is mostly consumed by expenses, leaving nothing for savings. 

In order to improve his business he wants to refurbish his stock of electrical goods at the shop.  Naheed has therefore requested for a loan from Brac Pakistan to help her husband. They are hopeful that this investment will prove to be beneficial for them.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her husband's electrical shop.

loans.name: Wilfrido Miguel

texts.es:
Wilfrido es un campesino de santo domingo, un hombre dedicado a la producción agrícola, en una finca hereda de su familia y que ha tratado de mantener a pesar de los constantes cambios climáticos que le han significado múltiples perdidas.
Wilfrido a través de su padre aprendió del negocio, y capto a la perfección las enseñanzas y el mejor valor que este le dejo fue el sentido de la responsabilidad, la nobleza y la honradez.
Wilfrido es responsable de su pareja y de 6 hijos todos ellos depende de él y Wilfrido depende exclusivamente de su negocio que estos días no ha andado muy bien. 
Buscando un mejor horizonte para su finca  Wilfrido solicitara un crédito que invertirá en la compra de abonos, riegos, fertilizantes, fungicidas, pesticidas.
Wilfrido espera su apoyo para seguir demostrando que a pesar que es desplazado por la violencia puede volverse a levantar y mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Wilfrido is a farmer from Santo Domingo. He makes a living in agricultural production on a farm inherited from his family. He has tried to maintain this farm despite the constant climatic changes that have resulted in numerous losses for him.

Wilfrido learned the business from his father and mastered his teachings. The best values his father instilled in him were the sense of responsibility, integrity, and honesty.

Wilfrido is reponsible for his partner and 6 children. They all depend on him, and Wilfrido depends solely on his business which hasn't been going very well lately.

In search of a better future for his farm, Wilfrido is requesting a loan that he will invest in the purchase of organic fertilizers, irrigation, fertilizers, fungicides, and pesticides. Wilfrido awaits your help to continue to show that despite the fact that he is displaced by violence, he can lift up and support his family again.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers, irrigation, fertilizers, fungicides, and pesticides.

loans.name: Leon

texts.en:
Leon has been growing vegetables in greenhouses for 18 years. He primarily raises early and late cucumbers. Leon is a hardworking and responsible person. He plans to develop his business since it is the only source of his family's income.

Leon is asking for a loan of 10,000 UAH to buy seed, film and fertilizers. He also wants to do some repairs to his greenhouses. This loan will help him get ready for the new season.

loans.use: to buy seeds, film and fertilizers.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 32 years old and married. She sells clothes and has been in the business for five years. 

With this loan, she would like to buy more clothes for young children to resell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for young children to resell.

loans.name: Sheila Mar

texts.en:
Sheila Mar is 26 years old and married with two children, one whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Sheila Mar runs a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.  She has been in this business for four years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Jean Claude

texts.en: Jean Claude is 32 years old, and he is not married. He has a shop and has been in a business for three years. With the loan, he would like to buy more brooms, stoves and baskets to resell. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: To buy more brooms, stoves and baskets to resell.

loans.name: Gea

texts.en:
Gea is a 41-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Concepcion, Iloilo. Her eldest child is thirteen and the youngest is four. 

Gea runs a small bakeshop in her place. She has been in the business with her husband for more than three years now.

Gea is asking for a loan to buy more ingredients like flour, baking soda, butter, milk, sugar, food colouring and flavouring. With a loan, Gea will be able to bake more bread to sell in her bakeshop.

In the future, Gea hopes to make her business successful and profitable. Furthermore, she wants to save money for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like flour, baking soda, butter, milk, sugar, food coloring and flavorings

loans.name: Mukaram

texts.ru: Мукарам жительница города Истаравшана. Ей 56 лет. Она замужем  и имеет пятерых  детей. Мукарам  трудолюбивая женщина, она настоящая мастерица по рукоделию. Она занимается вышивкой национальной одежды. За свою деятельность она успела изучить все тонкости своего дела и воспитать ряд учеников. Мукарам  с самого начала своей деятельности привыкла выполнять заказ на высшем  уровне. Мукарам нужны средства для лечения своей дочери. Так как лекарство дорогостоящие, у неё не хватает собственных средств на лечение.  Она обратилась в МДО Арванд для получения  кредита. Заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Mukaram is a resident of the city of Istaravshan. She is 56 and married with five children. She is a hardworking woman and a true master of handicrafts. She works sewing clothing in the national style. She has succeeded in learning all the intricacies of her craft and in teaching a series of students. From the very start of her business, she made it a habit to fulfill each order at the highest level.

Mukaram needs to borrow money to buy medicine for her daughter, as it is expensive and she can't pay for it on her own. She has turned to Arvand for a loan. She thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy medicine for her daughter

loans.name: Marie

texts.en: Marie is 44 years old. She is married and has six children aged between 9 and 26 years old, all of whom go to school. She sells clothes and has been doing business for three years. With the loan, she would like to buy more clothes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ganjina

texts.ru: Ганчина юная девушка из городка Турсунзаде. Ей всего 20 лет. Ганчина приветливая, вежливая и отличается своей добротой и искренностью. У нее большая семья, состоящая из родителей, двоих братьев и двоих сестер. Ганчина не учиться, и сидит дома и занимается вязанием. Она освоила технику вязания быстро и уже это увлечение длиться 4 года. Ее увлечение постепенно превратилось в бизнес. Теперь она самостоятельно начала зарабатывать. Так как бизнес новый и клиентов у нее мало, она хочет купить пряжей и вязать образцы ее работы для новых клиентов. Для купли пряжей ей не хватает определенной суммы, и она планирует собрать недостающую сумму за счет кредита. Она обещает выплачивать кредит в срок без опозданий.
texts.en:
Ganjina is a young woman of 20 from the city of Tursun-zoda. She is friendly and polite and distinguishes herself with her kindness and sincerity. She has a big family consisting of her parents, two brothers and two sisters. She doesn't go to university, but works at home doing crochet. She mastered this craft quickly and has been doing it for four years now. 

Ganjina's passion has gradually turned into a business, and she has started earning money with it. Since her business is new and she doesn't have many clients yet, she wants to buy yarn and crochet examples of her work for new clients. She doesn't have enough money to buy the necessary amount of yarn, and wants to bridge the gap with a loan. She promises to pay the loan back on time.

loans.use: to buy yarn for her crochet business

loans.name: Karla Yanira

texts.es:
Karla de 36 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene 4 hijos de 6, 8, 11 y 14 años de edad, estudió hasta 4° grado de educación básica, su pareja es comerciante se dedica a vender dulces, él y sus hijos viven con ella.

Carla también es comerciante, vende golosinas y bebidas, actividad que aprendió con su hermana mayor, antes Karla vendía dulces en las rutas de buses que transitaban cerca de donde ella vive, actualmente su negocio está a 200 mts de donde ella vive, le apoya su madre y trabajan de 8:00 am a 5:00 pm. Solicita el préstamo para comprar todo tipo de golosinas y bebidas coma gaseosas, refrescos jugos y demás para su negocio. Sueña con comprar una motocicleta para movilizarse fácilmente a su negocio.
texts.en:
Karla is 36 years old, is in a relationship and has 4 children aged 6, 8, 11 and 14. She studied up the 4th year of basic education. Her husband is a businessman who sells sweets. He and her children live with her.

Carla is also a businessperson selling sweets and drinks. She learned the business from her older sister. Before Carla sold sweet on the bus route that pass close to where she lives. Now her business is 200 meters from where she lives. Her mother helps her and she works from 8 am until 5 pm.

She is requesting a loan to buy all kinds of sweets and drinks like soft drinks, fruit juices and others for her business. She dreams of buying a motorcycle to be able to move easily with her business.

loans.use: to buy all kinds of sweets and drinks like soft drinks, fruit juices and others for her business.

loans.name: Nazi

texts.en: Nazi is a 43-year-old married woman. She lives in a small village of Gurjaani district with her husband Nikoloz and two school-aged children. The family lives in poverty. Nazi and Nikoloz have been trading chairs for seven years. They rent a car to transport chairs. They decided to purchase a minibus to reduce transportation costs. The start up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables Nazi to get a loan of $3900 to purchase a minibus. As the minibus is purchased, they will purchase more chairs and will provide a supply to clients more effectively. The family income will be increased and they will be able to provide better living conditions for their children.

loans.use: to purchase a minibus and transport chairs in order to reduce transportation costs and increase income

loans.name: Islomiddin

texts.ru:
Исломиддин молодой женатый человек в возрасте 24 лет. Он живет в столице, в городе Душанбе с женой и ребенком. Исломиддин имеет собственный бизнес. Три года назад в городе он открыл свое фотоателье, где он занимается фотографириванием клиентов для документов, а также там же он занимается продажей флешкарт, фотоальбомов и т.д. 
Исломиддин в настоящий момент обратился за кредитом для оплаты за учебный контракт своего племянника. Дело в том, что его племянник в этом году поступил в Таджикский Национальный Университет для получения второго высшего образования по специальности юриспруденция. Он накопил половину сумму контракта, однако ему еще не хватает 800 долларов США для полной оплаты. Исломиддин решил помочь племяннику с оплатой его учебного контракта. Он просит в кредит эту недостающую сумму в размере 800 долларов и обещает выплачивать его в срок за счет своего бизнеса. Исломиддин верит и надеется на финансовую поддержку с вашей стороны.
texts.en:
Islomiddin is a young married man of 24. He lives in the capital city of Dushanbe with his wife and child. He has his own business, a photo studio he started three years ago. He works taking photos for people for documents and also selling memory cards, photo albums, etc.

Islomiddin is currently requesting a loan to pay his nephew's university tuition. His nephew entered his first year at Tajik State University this year to receive his second degree in law. He has saved half of the money required but is short by $800 USD. Islomiddin has decided to help his nephew with his tuition costs. He is requesting a loan of $800 and promises to pay it back on time using profits from his business. He believes in and hopes for financial support from your end.

loans.use: to pay his nephew's university tuition

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is a young farmer from Kamobo a remote village in Nandihills area of Kenya.  She has defied the common thinking about most Kenyans that agriculture is only for the older generation. Betty  is happily married and together with her husband they are blessed with 2 children. 

Her primary source of income is milk and also she plants tomatoes on her farm named, “ever blazing farm”. She also engages in personal business and has been able to earn a handsome profit from the venture. 

Although she earns handsome profits from farming, she faces one big challenge and that is the high price of fertilizers, seedlings and inputs. This is the result of the monopoly that is enjoyed by the only agro vet shop in her area. 

Thus, she is requesting a loan to start an agro vet shop. Kamobo area has only one agro dealer who is catering for thousands of smallholder farmers who solely depend on them for agricultural inputs.  Betty will help the smallholder farmers in this area who for a long time have been having a serious problem accessing affordable farm inputs. 

Through your loan, Betty will change from the peasant farmer she is right now to a certified agro dealer who will be depended on by nearly 2000 smallholder farmers in her area both for input, knowledge and information about improved inputs. Through increased income from the loan she will improve her living conditions, and her future plans are to purchase a truck which will be used to engage farmers in output marketing activities. 

Betty believes that youths like her can find farming rewarding. She patiently waits for your kindness.

loans.use: to start an agrovet shop.

loans.name: Jeannette

texts.en: Jeannette is 27 years old. She is married with two children aged between four and six years old, both of whom go to school. She has a shop and has been in business for 10 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more small fish, cooking oil and ground nuts to resell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more small fish, cooking oil and ground nuts to resell.

loans.name: Ninfa

texts.en:
Ninfa is 54 years old and married with four children, one of whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Ninfa runs a buy-and-sell nipa roofing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional nipa roofing to sell.

Ninfa has been in this business for 20 years.

She would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional nipa roofing to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase thread, needles, fabric, buttons, elastic bands, etc.

loans.name: Liney Del Rosario

texts.es:
Liney es una mujer humilde pero trabajadora que a pesar de que se separó de su esposo, busca alternativas para darles el sustento a sus 4 hijos, gracias a su negocio de venta de carne, pollos y quesos ha sabido darles una educación y un alimento. Sus hijos son todos ellos menores de edad y busca ahora una ayuda para mejorar las condiciones de su negocio.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido en carne de cerdos, res, pollo, comprar quesos y alimentos.
Gracias a este crédito podrá tener un mejor volumen y movimiento de ventas.
Liney estará impacientemente esperando tu apoyo.
texts.en:
Liney is a humble but hardworking woman. In spite of separating from her husband, she's seeking alternatives to give her four children a living. 

Thanks to her business selling meat, chicken and cheeses, she's managed to give them an education and food. Her children are all minors, and she's now looking for help to improve her business conditions.

She seeks a loan to buy pork, beef, chicken, cheeses and foods. Thanks to this loan, she'll be able to have a larger volume and movement of sales. Liney will be eagerly awaiting your support.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of pork, beef, chicken, cheese and food.

loans.name: Liliana Cecilia

texts.es:
Lilaina de 27 años de edad, se ha ganado el cariño de todos sus vecinos por su amabilidad y buen sentido del humor. Ama su familia, la cual es el motor principal para luchar cada día y generar el sustento para sobrevivir. 

Aunque no contaba con recursos para iniciar su negocio, esto no fue impedimento para cumplir su sueño de convertirse en comerciante, con un pequeño capital, esta mujer inició con un negocio de tienda de abarrotes.

Sus sueños no paran, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar para abastecer su negocio.
 
Espera poder mejorar su condición económica, poder tener una vejez sin preocupaciones monetarias y garantizarle a su familia un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Lilaina, 27, has won the affection of her neighbors because of her kindness and her good sense of humor. She loves her family, which is what drives her to struggle every day and to put food on the table. Although she didn't have many resources with which to start her business, she didn't let this stop her from achieving her dream of becoming a businesswoman. 

With little capital, she started her own grocery store. She hasn't stopped dreaming; for this reason, she is requesting a loan to invest in basic staples to stock her business. She hopes to be able to improve her economic situation, to grow older without monetary concerns, and to guarantee a better future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase basic staples to stock her business

loans.name: Fatima Oliva

texts.es:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado un Cantón muy hermoso, su clima es cálido húmedo su gente es amable y trabajadora este Cantón es el punto de llegada de muchos turistas ya que a los alrededores del mismo tenemos muchas hosterías en las que se puede descansar y ser tratados con amabilidad y respeto 
En este Cantón vive y tiene el negocio la señora Fátima una mujer luchadora de 39 años es madre soltera tiene 2 hijas la primera de 15 años y la ultima de 9 años, ellas estudian en la escuela y colegio del sector, tiene una tienda de víveres en general aprendió de esta actividad por iniciativa propia, con este negocio y con mucho esfuerzo está sacando adelante a sus hijas, al mismo le dedica un promedio de 12 horas diarias, ella paso por momentos muy difíciles uno de ellos fue la separación de su esposo 
Solicita este crédito para invertir en el negocio en la ampliación del negocio comprando activos para el mismo, con esta nueva inversión podrá incrementar sus ventas y podrá mejorar sus ingresos económicos, La señora Fátima agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado is a very beautiful canton. Its climate is warm and humid, its people are friendly and hardworking. For many tourists, this canton is the point of entry to the surrounding area, so it has many hotels where one can relax and be treated with friendliness and respect.

Fatima lives and has a business in this canton. She's a striving woman, 39 years old, and the single mother of two daughters. The oldest is 15 and the youngest is 9. They study in the elementary and high schools of the region. 

Fatima has a store for basic goods. She learned this business through her own initiative, and through it, she's moving her children forward with a lot of effort. She dedicates 12 hours per day to her store. She's been through very difficult moments, one of which was the separation from her husband.

She's seeking this loan to invest in the growth of the business, buying assets for it. With this new investment, she'll be able to increase her sales and improve her income. Fatima thanks Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the opportunity they're providing.

loans.use: to invest in her business and increase her income, allowing her to move her children forward.

loans.name: Egidio Noe

texts.es:
Egidio con 39 años de edad, soltero. Durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a diversas actividades de manera independiente, con lo que ha generado ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. 

Hace 3, comenzó a realizar la actividad de comercialización de cerdos, pues los compra, los cría, engorda y posteriormente los vende según el peso adquirido por el animal, esto le permite obtener los recursos para sobrevivir. 

El titular es un hombre luchador, pujante, se esmera cada día para salir adelante motivado por su fe y energía, esto lo impulsó a solicitar el crédito con la Corporación Interactuar, para invertirlo en la adecuación y reformas en su corral, así podrá tener sus animales en mejores condiciones. 
De esta manera, Egidio espera avanzar un paso más hacia el cumplimiento de su sueño principal, que es formalizar su negocio y hacerlo sostenible, que sea rentable y perdurable en el tiempo y lograr una estabilidad económica. 

Mejora la vida de este colombiano con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Egidio is 39 years old and single. Throughout his productive life, he has made his living independently, doing a variety of jobs with which he has generated the income necessary to support his family. Three years ago, he began to work in the sale of pigs. He purchases, raises, fattens, and sells the animals based on their weight, which allows him to make a living. 

Egidio is a persistent man who takes great pains every day to get ahead, motivated by his faith and his energy. This has lead him to request a loan from Corporación Interactuar, which he will invest in renovations and modifications to his pen so that his animals can live in better conditions. In this way, Egidio hopes to take step toward his main dream: to formalize his business and make it sustainable, profitable, and lasting, and to achieve economic stability. 

Improve Egidio's life with a loan!

loans.use: to make renovations and modifications to his pen

loans.name: Guler

texts.en:
Guler is 32 years old. As a married mother of three children, she works hard to support her family and improve their financial situation. Her husband is a teacher but his salary is not enough to cover the family's needs. Guler didn't attend school because her parents had limited financial resources. 

She  runs a mixed farm, in a rural location in the Agdash region. She does dairy and poultry farming, producing milk and eggs for consumption and sale. She also grows crops and engages in other agriculture-related businesses, to make extra income. 

Guler is appealing to Kiva lenders to help her  with a loan of 1,500 AZN. She will use the money to purchase cattle and increase her milk production, to meet the demand in the market.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and increase her milk production.

loans.name: Sophie

texts.en:
Sophie lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with 10 children, five of whom go to school. She also takes care of additional family members. She operates a pub and has been in this business for 11 years. 

She has applied for a loan of 3,000,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more crates of beer and soda and Airtime. She generates additional income from operating mobile money services and selling Airtime. 

She works in a shop for seven days a week and sells on a retail basis. Her major business challenges include thieves and seasonality. She is aspiring. She resides in the family house, and the family has access to electricity does not have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy crates of beer, soda and Airtime.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is a fifty-four-year-old married woman living in Ormoc, Leyte. She engages in running a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells basic merchandise like noodles, canned goods, cooking oil, matches, eggs and soap. She has been engaged in this kind of business for four years now.

She faces financial problems as of the moment, and she needs capital again to operate her store. Angelita is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy various merchandise for the store, and farming supplies like fertilizers, rice seedlings and pesticide for the start up of her farming livelihood. These are very important tools that would definitely uplift the source of living that Angelita has right now. This will also help increase the yield of her farm.

Someday, Angelita is hoping that she can handle both of her businesses successfully for the improvement of her livelihood.

loans.use: to buy various merchandise for the store, and  farming supplies like fertilizers, rice seedlings and pesticide for the start up of her farming livelihood.

loans.name: Teresia

texts.en:
Teresia is 59 years old. She is married to Ephantus and together they have been blessed with 7 adult children aged between 36 and 24 years.

Teresia is a farmer, a business she has done for the last 38 years, now earning a monthly income of KES 6,000.

Teresia has requested her 2nd loan with VisionFund Kenya of KES 30,000 which she will use to buy fertilizers, seeds and farm equipment. She successfully repaid her previous loan.

With the anticipated profits, Teresia will be able to see that her children who desire to further their studies, are able to do so, by paying their school fees.

Her hopes and dreams for the future are to buy a piece of land and build a house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds and farm equipment.

loans.name: Dionel De Jesus

texts.es:
Sequías que afectan la cosecha, fuertes lluvias son problemas que han inquietado a los agricultores que han tenido que usar medios ortodoxos para mantener sus cultivos, Dionel por ejemplo le ha tocado regar sus cultivos para que no se sequen.
Dionel es padre de 2 hijos menores de edad y lo más preocupante es que depende únicamente de estos cultivos para generar le sustento para su familia por ello tiene una urgencia de solicitar un crédito pues necesita comprar insumos para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos que aguanten este clima tan extraño.
Con la ayuda de este crédito Dionel comprara riegos y pesticidas, insecticidas ya que por la sequía los animales rondan mucho sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Droughts that affect crops and heavy rains are problems that have troubled farmers who have had to use unorthodox methods to maintain their crops. Dionel, for example, has had to irrigate his crops so they don't dry out.

Dionel is the father of two minor children. The most troubling thing is that he depends entirely on these crops to generate his family's livelihood. Because of this, he's urgently seeking a loan because he needs to buy inputs to maintain his crops that can withstand such an unusual climate.

With the help of this loan, Dionel will buy irrigation equipment, pesticides and insecticidas because during drought, animals prowl his crops frequently.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and insecticides because droughts attract many animals.

loans.name: L.l. Henjou English Scholl Group (D)

texts.en:
Hatkhoneng is an affectionate mother of three boys and two girls from a small village called Nungka in Saikul Sub-Division of Manipur. She is a simple agricultural labourer with an income of about 3,000 INR monthly. She is the featured borrower of the group. 

Both she and her son are pictured with their hands raised. Her husband is also a cultivator and helps in paying for his children’s education and their monthly expenditure. Both of them work very hard to sustain their family and can hardly afford to send their children to school. The children go to L.L Henjou English High School. Their main obstacle in life was paying school admission fees on time and this is the reason why they are looking forward to the Kiva education loan for their children. 

With many children at school, it is very difficult for low income family to pay fees for all at one time. With the Kiva loan, she will pay the annual school fees of her son including admission fees, textbooks and exercise books for the new session 2015. Hatkhoneng feels relieved now that she does not have to worry about her son’s annual fees. She says “thank you Kiva.” The rest of the group members also have the same goal to get the Kiva education loan to pay for their children's annual school fees. They feel indebted to Kiva and send their warm wishes to the lenders.

loans.use: To pay for school expenses including admission fees, textbooks, exercise books and annual fees for the academic year 2015.

loans.name: Celsie

texts.en:
Celsie is 53 years old and married with four children.

Celsie works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Celsie has borrowed and repaid 24 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from fishing.

Celsie aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Yenis De La Paz

texts.es:
Yenis de 37 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 11 años de edad, ambos están estudiando, ella estudió hasta 9° grado de educación básica, su pareja trabaja colocando y reparando cielos falsos.

Yenis es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de bisutería, paro edemas incluye productos cosméticos y artículos de primera necesidad en el hogar, antes era empleada en una tienda donde vende ropa y fue ahí donde aprendió a comerciar. Su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 am a 4:00 pm

Solicita el préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio comprando piedras decorativas, cosméticos como cremas, labiales y pinta uñas, sujetadores de cabello y demás. Yenis sueña tener su propia casa obtenida como fruto del esfuerzo de su trabajo.
texts.en:
Yenis is 37 years old. She has a live-in partner and two children, aged 5 and 11, both of whom are in school. She went to school up to the 9th grade of basic education. Her partner works installing and repairing drop ceilings. 

Yenis is a merchant. She dedicates herself to selling costume jewelry, but she also includes cosmetic products and necessary items for the home. In the past she was an employee in a store where clothing was sold, and that is where she learned how to sell. Her working hours are from 7:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

She is requesting the loan to invest in her business, buying decorative stones; cosmetics such as creams, lipsticks and nail polish; and hair clips, among other items. Yenis dreams of having her own home, obtaining it as the fruit of her business efforts.

loans.use: to buy decorative stones; cosmetics such as creams, lipsticks and nail polish; and hair clips, among other items.

loans.name: Diana

texts.en:
Diana is 35 years old, married with two children both of whom are in school. Diana works very hard to provide for them.

Diana runs a food vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business like sugar, flour, etc.

Diana has been in this business for 5 years. 

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business like sugar, flour.

loans.name: Coşqun

texts.en:
Coşqun is 31 years old, married and he has 2 kids. He loves his children very much and tries to provide them with a good upbringing. He is a kind and hardworking man. They live in the Agdash region. 

He couldn’t get a higher education and because of that he decided to start his own business. For that he choose farming. He is growing fruits and vegetables in his own yard. Coşqun has 10 years of experience in this field, thanks to his father but his situation is very hard. He needs to raise fruits and care for them, but the lack of water in the region makes a problem for him. 

Because of this problem, the productivity has fallen, and he can’t cover the family’s needs. He applied for a 1,100 AZN loan in order to be able to supply water to his garden weekly. This will increase the productivity again, and the family’s income will rise.

loans.use: to supply water to his garden weekly.

loans.name: Nuestra Señora De La Asuncion Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Nuestra Señora de la Asunción está en su ciclo número 2º del programa de comité de mujeres, todas y cada una esta poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder crecer y salir adelante y poder ayudar a sus familias.
Liz una de las integrantes comenta que a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de la venta de comidas que hace, esta logrando salir adelante y crecer. Comenta que le va muy bien ya que esta con muy buena clientela que siempre le hace pedido de sus comidas.
Liz pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos varios para hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras, carnes, pollo, jamón, queso y demás, de manera a poder seguir con su esfuerzo diario.
texts.en: The group called Nuestra Señora de la Asunción is in its second cycle with the Women's Committee program. Each and every one of these women is working very hard to be able to grow, move forward, and help their families. Liz is one of the group members. She comments that through hard work and dedication to selling the foods she makes, she is successfully moving forward and growing. She says that things are going very well for her: she has a good customer base that makes regular orders for her foods. Liz is requesting this loan in order to invest in various ingredients such as vegetables, beef, chicken, ham, cheese, and others. With these she will be able to continue working hard every day.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, beef, chicken, ham, cheese, and other items.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce, who deals in fresh foods, used the previous loan to buy bananas to sell. She loves her job which has enabled her to sustain her family's increasing demands. 

She still faces a challenge that her products are highly perishable. She dreams of buying a preservative machine that will help keep her products fresh for a long period of time. Joyce needs a loan to buy more fresh foods like tomatoes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more fresh foods like tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Athanasie

texts.en:
Athanasie is 33 years old. She is married with 3 children aged between 7 and 14 years, all of them go to school. She has a mini-market and has been in business for 14 years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more yoghurt, bread and juice to resell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy more yoghurt, bread and juice to resell.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 43 years old, married with five children two of whom are in school. Teresita works very hard to provide for them.

Teresita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Teresita has been in this business for 8 years. 

She would like to save money to expand her business and save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, noodles, sugar.

loans.name: Othela

texts.en:
Othela is 44 years old and married with three children, who are all attending school. Othela works very hard to provide for them.

Othela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,500 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Othela has been in this business for ten years and sells a variety of items such as soft-drinks, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future Othela would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Reyna Elizabeth

texts.es:
Reyna de 37 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene cuatro hijos de 4, 6, 15 y 17 años de edad y todos están estudiando pre-kínder, 1°, 2° y noveno grado respectivamente. Ella solo pudo estudiar hasta 6° grado de educación básica. Su esposo es militar y trabaja en las fuerzas armadas. Solo él y sus hijos viven con ella.

Reyna es comerciante, se dedica a vender ropa desde hace 20 años, aprendió con su pareja que antes se dedicaba a lo mismo; Reyna vende de manera ambulante de casa en casa en su comunidad y en las comunidades aledañas, cuando sus hijos no estudian le apoyan en esta actividad. Su horario de trabaja es de 8:00 am a 4:00 pm.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar por mayoreo ropa de diferentes tallas y estilos para demás y caballeros, para aprovecha esta época navideña que se acerca que es cuando más se vende ropa. Sueña con tener un local para su negocio y si no tener que recorrer grandes distancias.
texts.en:
Reyna is 37 years old. She has a live-in partner and four children, who are 4, 6, 15 and 17 years old. All of them are in school, in pre-kínder, 1st, 2nd and 9th grades, respectively. She was only able to attend school up to the 6th grade of basic education. Her husband is in the military and works with the armed forces. Only he and their children live with her. 

Reyna is a merchant. She has dedicated herself to selling clothing for 20 years. She learned this profession along with her spouse, who previously dedicated himself to the same work. Reyna sells as a mobile vendor, going from house to house in her community and in more distant areas. When her children are not in school, they help her with her work. Her working hours are 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

She is requesting the loan to buy wholesale clothing of various sizes and styles, for both men and women, to take advantage of the coming Christmas season, since it is when the most clothing is sold. She dreams of having a shop where she can operate her business and not have to travel over long distances.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothing of various sizes and styles, for men and women.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials for pig pen renovation, purchase additional piglets, pig feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es: Emilio tiene 54 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos y tres hijas. Emilio posee un negocio de venta de variedad de focos y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Emilio desea reparar el techo de su vivienda dado que se encuentra deteriorado por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, hierro, etc. y así poder dar a su familia mejores condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en:
Emilio, 54, lives in his own house with his life partner and his two sons and three daughters.  Emilio earns a living and supports his household with his business selling a variety of light bulbs

Emilio wants to repair the roof of his house because it's deteriorating.  He's asking FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, rebar, etc. so he can give his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, rebar, etc. so he can give his family better living conditions

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es:
Blanca de 34 años de edad, esta casada y tiene 3 hijos estudiando 1er año de bachillerato, 5 y 3er grado de educación básica, su esposo es agricultor de granos básicos, solo él y sus hijos viven con ella.

Blanca es comerciante, tiene una venta de refrescos, pasteles de carne, papa, pollo o mezclados, enchiladas y yuca frita desde hace 4 años, aprendió a vender con su madre, que vendía dulce de panela y ella la acompañaba en su ruta de venta. No tiene un lugar fijo de venta ya que recorre varios caseríos, pero la mayor distancia que recorre es de 2 kilómetros caminando. Al terminar su venta vuelve en autobús.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz, repollo, papas, salsa de tomate, salsa picante, frutas para refrescos, 10 lbs de azúcar, 500 bolsas plásticas, para su negocio en la elaboración de su producto. Sueña con que sus hijos terminen sus estudios, mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Blanca is 34 years old. She is married and has 3 children, who are in the first year of high school and the 5th and 3rd grades of basic education. Only her husband and her children live with her. 

Blanca is a merchant. She has a business selling fruit drinks; pastries with a meat, potato, chicken or mixed filling; enchiladas; and fried yuca. She has operated this business for 4 years. She learned to sell from her mother, who sold brown sugar sweets, and Blanca accompanied her on her sales route. She does not have a fixed point of sale, since she covers various neighborhoods. However, the greatest distance she covers is 2 kilometers on foot. When she finishes her sales, she returns by bus. 

She is requesting the loan to buy corn, cabbage, potatoes, tomato sauce, fruit to make drinks, 10 pounds of sugar, and 500 plastic bags for her business. These will be used to prepare her products. She dreams of improving her home and seeing her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy corn, cabbage, potatoes, tomato sauce, fruit to make drinks, 10 pounds of sugar, and 500 plastic bags for her business.

loans.name: Naomie

texts.en:
Naomie is 28 years old, married with two children two whom in school, Naomie works very hard to provide for them.

Naomie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, sugar, canned, noodles etc.

Naomie has been in this business for 2 years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, sugar, canned, noodles,

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm implements, high-quality seeds, good fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Maria Iclea

texts.es:
María de 51 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos de 27, 24, 22 y 20 años de edad, la mayor está acompañada y vive aparte, los demás dos estudian y el otro hace poco dejo de trabajar. Ella estudio hasta 5° grado de educación básica, no continuo por falta de recursos económicos. Su esposo es agricultor de granos básicos, él sus 3 hijos y dos nietos son los que viven con ella.

María es comerciante, vende pupusas, refrescos, enchiladas, chocolate caliente y panes con pollo desde hace 9 años, antes vendía en su casa productos de básicos para el hogar pero al ver que le fue mejor en esta actividad decidió seguir. Vende los días sábados y domingos en la cancha de futbol de su comunidad ubicada a 150 mts de su casa, su esposo le ayuda a llevar su venta.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar 5 repollos, 5 piñas, 15 libras de chicharrón, 10 quintales de maíz, un quintal de frijol y un cilindro de gas para su negocio. María espera que sus hijos logren terminar sus estudios y que algún día la apoyen económicamente, también quiere adecuar su casa para su venta.
texts.en:
María, 51, is married and has four children, ages 27, 24, 22, and 20.  The oldest one is married and lives on her own, two more attend school, and the other one stopped work a short time ago.  Her husband is a farmer who grows basic grains.  He, three of their children, and two grandchildren live with her.  María studied up to fifth grade; she didn't have the financial resources to continue.

María's a merchant.  She has sold pupusas, soft drinks, enchiladas, hot chocolate, and chicken sandwiches for nine years.  Before that she sold basic household products from her home, but when she saw that it was better for her to sell food, she decided to continue with it.  She sells on Saturdays and Sundays on the soccer field in her community, located 150 meters from her house.  Her husband helps her with her sales.

She's requesting the loan to buy 5 heads of cabbage, 5 pineapples, 15 pounds of chicharrones, 10 quintals of corn, 1 quintal of beans, and a cylinder of gas for her business.

María hopes her children manage to finish school and that one day they'll help her financially.  She also wants to renovate her house to sell it.

loans.use: to buy 5 heads of cabbage, 5 pineapples, 15 pounds of chicharrones, 10 quintals of corn, 1 quintal of beans, and a cylinder of gas for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sodas, juices, and candy.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy laminated sheets, wood, and iron to repair the roof of his home and so to give his family better living conditions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beans, sugar, a refrigerator, shelves, laundry detergent, washing-up liquid, bleach, toilet paper, and other things.

loans.name: Kuña Marangatu Group

texts.es:
19 son las mujeres que forman este grupo, ellas son amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de Pilar, están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza que a través de la encuesta de los 50 indicadores buscan mejorar la calidad de vida de estas señoras.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Magna quien a través de sus ventas varias en la despensa que tiene, se ha abierto camino y ya tiene muy buena clientela.  Ella poco a poco y con mucho esfuerzo pudo formar su negocio, el cual hoy día ya es el sostén de la familia. 
La Sra. Magna quiere seguir creciendo, y es por eso que pide este préstamo para la compra de productos ya sea harina, carne, verduras, fideos, aceite, azúcar, etc. y luego vender a los clientes, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
There are 19 women in this loan group. They are friends and neighbors in the city of Pilar. They are part of the poverty elimination program that, through addressing 50 indicators, seeks to improve the quality of life for these women.
One of the members is Magna who, by means of selling in her store, has opened-up new possibilities and already has a good customer base. Little by little, and with much effort, she was able to set-up her business. Today this business supports her family. 
Magna wants to keep growing and this is why she has requested a loan to buy products such as flour, meat, vegetables, pasta, oil, sugar, etc, which she will later sell to her customers. This will help her to implement her plan for her business, which will help her to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy flour, meat, vegetables, pasta, oil, sugar, etc.

loans.name: San Luis Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Luis está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan mediante capacitaciones de elaboración de Productos de Limpiezas donde todas participaron con mucho entusiasmo por aprender, también mediante los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa lograron aumentar sus ingresos y superar la línea de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maricel quien tiene una despensa, vende todo tipo de productos, y se sacrifica para poder salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida. Maricel ayuda a su familia por medio de su trabajo y quiere seguir haciéndolo es por eso que se esta esforzando.
La Sra. Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de los productos de necesidades básicas como por ejemplo: leche, azúcar, aceite, harina, entre otros.
texts.en:
San Luis Group is in its second loan cycle in the women's bank program.  All the members participated enthusiastically in their trainings to make cleaning products.  Also, learning about the vital behavior of a successful woman, they managed to increase their income and surpass the poverty line.

One of the members, Maricel, has a store.  She sells all types of products and makes sacrifices to get ahead and be someone in life.  Maricel helps her family with her job.  She wants to keep doing so, and that's why she's making an effort.

She's requesting this loan to buy basic staples, including milk, sugar, oil, and flour.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, oil, flour, and other products to sell

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en: Catherine is 40 years old and a mother of three. She helps her husband in gaining income through buying and reselling fish within the public market. She has been in this business for almost 20 years. She aims to improve more of her business and increase her income to sustain her family needs and finance the education of her children. Due to capital insufficiency, she would like to avail an additional loan of PHP 7,000 to buy more stocks of fish, shrimp and eggshell to resell. Having this financial assistance, Catherine believes that someday she will further improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of fish, shrimp and eggshell to resell.

loans.name: Matha

texts.en: Matha is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Matha joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for her children: Isti, Elkana and Absalom. Before she became a Babban Gona member, Matha would have had to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for her immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan, and Babban Gona’s support, Matha can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Matha spoke of her ambition to use the additional income to educate her children, eventually hoping to ensure her children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: to pay for school fees and uniforms, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena is 51 years old, married, and has two children, one of whom is in school. Nena works very hard to provide for them.

Nena runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, canned food, noodles, etc. to sell.

Nena has been in this business for five years. 

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, groceries, canned food, noodles, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Edith

texts.en:
Edith lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with four children, all of whom attend school. She is also looking after her mother.

She has been selling charcoal from home at retail for the last ten years, working six days a week. She does not have any other source of income.

She has requested a loan of Ugandan Shillings 600,000 from MCDT-SACCO to enable her to stock fifteen sacks of charcoal.

Her challenges include seasonality and transportation costs. Her dream is to open other outlets in busy trading centers near her residence. She joined MCDT because of the low interest charged on loans.

She rents a house with access to electricity and does not have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Sonia Yamileth

texts.es:
Sonia es comerciante, tiene una venta de tortillas, aprendió por si sola y por la necesidad de dar lo mejor a sus hijos, el negocio lo tiene en su casa y trabaja de 7:00 am a 1:00 pm

Solicita el préstamo para comprar varios quintales de maíz a la vez ya que cuando lo comprar por arroba le sale muy caro, además quiere comprar leña para su negocio. Sonia espera seguir trabajando para dar lo mejor a sus hijos y terminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Sonia is a business woman who makes a living selling tortillas.  She learned by herself because of the necessity to give the best to her children. She has the business in her house and she works from 7AM until 1PM.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy several hundred-weights (quintals) of corn at a time since when she buys it by smaller weights (arroba: 25-pound weight) it is more expensive.  She also wants to buy wood for her business.  Sonia hopes to continue working in order to give the best to her children and so that they can finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy several hundred-weights (quintals) of corn and wood for her business

loans.name: Marithe

texts.en:
Marithe is 42 years old. She is married with five children aged between 8 and 22 years; all of them go to school. She has a restaurant and has been in business for five years.

With the loan, she would like to buy more food to store and get the requirements necessary for an up-to-date restaurant to resell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: buy more food to store and get the requirements necessary for an up-to-date restaurant to resell.

loans.name: Maria Teodora

texts.es:
María de 58 años de edad, esta casada y tiene cuatro hijos, solo uno vive con ella y los demás tienen su propio hogar, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar debido a que su familia no podía costear el estudio. Su esposo es agricultor y ella es comerciante de frutas, pero además se dedica a criar cerdos. Su negocio lo tiene en su casa y a veces en otro lugares cercanos, en ocasiones es ambulante y camina cerca de 3.5 kilómetros en su ruta de venta.

Solicita el préstamo para terminar de construir su casa para no tener problemas con el techo como los que tuvo en el recién pasado invierno. Ella sueña con ver su casa lista y vivir cómodamente con su familia.
texts.en:
María, 58, is married and has four children. Only one of them lives with her and the rest live with their own families. María could not study because her family could not pay for her studies. Her husband works in agriculture, and she sells fruits and raises pigs. She works at home, but sometimes as a street vendor, walking around 3.5 km [2.2 miles] to sell her products.

She is requesting a loan to finish building her house and avoid problems like the ones she had during the last rainy season. Her dream is to see her house finished and live a comfortable life with her family.

loans.use: to finish building her house and reinforce the roof.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, cement and gravel to be able to improve her housing conditions as soon as possible

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, pants, shirts, dresses, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy syrups, jellies, ice, condensed milk, glasses, spoons, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in makeup, lotions, deodorant, creams, etc

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia is happy in managing her sari-sari store business in their village. She engaged herself in this type of business because she wanted to have a source of income.

Antonia dreams to expand the business to enable her to raise her sales and income as well. With this, she is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy candies, condiments, drinks, and many more items.

Antonia believes that the loan will be a big contribution in reaching her dreams. She will prioritize to meet her family’s needs through the income she will gain from the business.

loans.use: to buy candies, condiments, drinks, and many more items.

loans.name: Arbia

texts.en:
Arbia is 52 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Arbia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, sugar, noodles, etc.

Arbia has been in this business for ten years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, sugar, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Andre

texts.en:
Andre is 54 years old. He is married with seven children aged between 12 and 27 years; six of them go to school. He sells clothes and has been working in this business for 19 years.

With the loan, he would like to buy more shoes and clothes for sale. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption and pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more shoes and clothes for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chickens, feed concentrate, and vitamins.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy doors and windows for her home.

loans.name: Misael

texts.es: Misael es un hombre de 56 años de edad que no se deja vencer ante las necesidades, por lo que desde hace 1 año se gana la vida con su tienda de productos varios en su vivienda, por lo que se siente feliz de tener este ingreso económico. Él habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 3 hijos de 18, 14 y 8 años de edad. Misael sabe que los productos que puede ofrecer a sus clientes son muchos más de los que tiene en su tienda actualmente, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI que le permita invertir en: champú, jabón, detergente, pan dulce, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, especies, golosinas, etc. Para que sus clientes se sientan satisfechos con su tienda.
texts.en:
Misael is a 56 year old man who does not give up in the face of needs. For the past year, he's earned a living through his store in his home that sells various products. He feels happy to have this source of income.

He lives in his own home together with his life partner and their three children who are 18, 14 and eight years old. 

Misael knows he could offer his customers far more products than what he currently has in his store. Because of this he's seeking a loan from FUSAI to allow him to invest in shampoo, soap, detergent, sweet bread, sugar, rice, beans, condiments, sweets, etc. so his customers will be satisfied with his store.

loans.use: to invest in shampoo, soap, detergent, sweet bread, sugar, rice, beans, condiments, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm implements.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.en:
Teodoro is an older adult and is  still strong and eager to work and succeed. Teodoro grows pineapple and regularly tends to his crops because he wants to assure that his crops are in good condition. 

Teodoro requests 20,000 PHP to maintain his crops. His faith leads him to believe that his crops will produce quality fruit. He will also improve his farming techniques.

loans.use: to cultivate his crops.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is a 56-year-old married woman from Concepcion, Iloilo. She has run a small sari-sari (retail business) for 5 years to earn an income.

Corazon wants to expand her business but lacks the financial resources to do so. She joined CEVI and requests  a loan to buy  soft drinks, energy drinks, candy, canned goods, noodles, soap, and toiletries. Corazon will be able to increase her stock and sell more to her customers.

 In the future, Corazon hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, energy drinks, candy, canned goods, noodles, soap, and toiletries.

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es:
La Sra. Ysabel es una señora muy sacrificada y trabajadora, se esfuerza para poder salir adelante e ir ganándose el sustento no solo para ella, sino también para su familia. Es una clienta recurrente de Kiva y comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso para la compra de insumos para pode cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes.
Hoy pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder cubrir los pedidos que tiene, ya que necesita telas, hilos, botones y demás. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en: Ysabel is a sacrificing and hard-working woman who works to not only support herself but also her family. She is a regular Kiva client and shares that her previous loan was used to buy items that she used to meet her customers' orders. Today she seeks another loan to be able to cover the orders she has, as she needs fabrics, threads, buttons, and other items.  She is thankful for this new opportunity that she is receiving and shares that it will be of great help.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads, buttons, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a wall around of the perimeter of her house to provide security for her home, and above all, for herself and her family

loans.name: Carlos Humberto

texts.es: Carlos es un hombre de 45 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia desde hace 8 años, por lo que se siente feliz de poder contar con un lugar propio en donde habitar. Él es un hombre que se esfuerza para sostener la economía de su hogar, por medio de su trabajo como motorista el cual realizad desde hace 8 años. Carlos desea adquirir un crédito con FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillo de piso, cemento, arena, grava y materiales para mejorar el techo y el piso de su vivienda, por lo que espera contar con este apoyo.
texts.en: Carlos is a 45 year old man who has lived in his own home for the past 8 years.  He is happy to be able to live in his own home.  He is a man who pushes himself in order to support his household economically.  He does this through his job as a taxi driver, which he has been doing for the past 8 years.  Carlos wants to request a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in brick for the foundation, cement, sand, gravel and other materials in order to improve his roof and the floor of his home. He hopes to count on your support.

loans.use: to invest in brick for the foundation, cement, sand, gravel and other materials in order to improve his roof and the floor of his home.

loans.name: Agellah

texts.en:
Angela is a 36-years-old married woman blessed with 3 children. She  farms and sells cereal. 

She plans to use this loan to buy  animal feed for her livestock and cereal to sell.  She will use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and save money. 

This is her first loan  from VisionFund Kenya and her future hopes are to expand her business and be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for her livestock and cereal  to  sell.

loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Eric is a 31-year-old single man. He has sold food for 12 years. 

He will use the loan to buy more beans and bananas to resell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy  beans and bananas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hair products.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
Juan, de 46 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, actualmente está solero pero tiene un hijo que vive con él y estudia 9° grado, además en su casa vive su prima. 

Juan, tiene un negocio de destazo de cerdos y ganado desde hace 3 años, trabajo que  aprendió por medio de su madre, también tiene una venta de hot-dog, hamburguesas y papas fritas.- El destazo lo hace los fin de semana y la venta de comida 4 días a la semana solo por la tarde.

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar ganado y cerdos para destazo y otra parte para mejorar la vivienda en que vive porque necesita en cementar el piso y pintar el interior de la casa. 

Mejorar su casa poco a poco es el sueño que tiene Juan, además seguir apoyar en el estudio a su hijo, de las ganancias espera comprar más animales para su negocio.
texts.en:
Juan, who is 46 years old, went to school through high school.  He is currently single but he has a son who lives with him and is in the 9th grade.  His cousin also lives in the house.

For 3 years Juan has had a business of butchering pigs and livestock, work that he learned from his mother.  He also has a business selling hot dogs, hamburgers and fries.  He does the butchering on weekends and he sells food four days a week only in the afternoon.

He will use the loan to buy livestock and pigs to butcher and the other part to improve the house in which he lives because he needs to cement the floor and to paint the inside of the house.

Improving his house, little by little, is the dream that Juan has, also to continue to support his son's studies.  With his earnings he hopes to buy more animals for his business.

loans.use: to buy livestock and pigs for butchering

loans.name: Pedro Salomón

texts.es:
Pedro, de 27 años de edad, estudió hasta 6° grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen una hija de 4 años, en su casa viven sus padres y una hermana y de él. 

La mayor parte de su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura oficio que aprendió de su padre.- Desde hace 6 meses es empleado de una ferretería, viaja en bus y en ocasiones en vehículo, se tarda 29 minutos para llegar a su trabajo, el horario es de 8:00 am a 4:00 pm. 

Pedro, necesita el crédito para ajustar el motor y reparar la dirección del vehículo que tiene, el carro es indispensable para transportarse hasta su trabajo y de regreso a su casa ya que por su horario casi siempre llega noche a su casa. 

El sueño de Pedro, es tener una casa más amplia para vivir más cómodos y para que su familia viva en condiciones dignas.
texts.en: Pedro is 27 years old and completed a 6th grade education. He is married and his wife is a domestic employee. They have a 4 year old daughter, and his parents and one of his sisters lives with them in their home. For most of his life he has farmed, a skill he learned from his father. 6 months ago he began work in a hardware store.
