The loan will be used to build 2 rooms in her house because she wants to offer her family a better quality of life with more comfort and security for her family at home.

loans.use: to build two rooms in her house.

loans.name: Balarebe

texts.en:
Balarebe is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Balarebe joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children: Yusuf and Mansur.  

Before he became a Babban Gona member, Balarebe would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Balarebe can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Balarebe  spoke of his  ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to ensure his children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: To pay for child school fees and uniforms; eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: 031701060002.thiệu Tâm Group

texts.en:
Hạnh has a wedding service business. She is applying for a loan to purchase more supplies to do her wedding service (lease dresses, clothes, make up service, etc.). Hạnh has been involved in this business for 5 years.

Hạnh is 30 years old and married with 2 children. She is the leader of a 7-member group, the 031701060002.Thiệu Tâm solidarity group. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013,  Hạnh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business.  Hạnh has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit,  Hạnh hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more supplies to do wedding services (lease dresses, clothes, make up service, etc.)

loans.name: Mal. Idi

texts.en:
Mal. Idi is a maize farmer from Kankanki village in Kaduna state. 

Before he became a Babban Gona member, Mal. Idi would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Mal. Idi can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

Mal. Idi, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to expand his farmland, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn at low prices at harvest.

loans.name: 07-Khu Phố 3-Phú Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lưu has a retail business selling dry food. She has been involved in this business for three years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more dry food to resell.

Lưu is 24 years old and is married with two children.

Lưu is the group leader of the 07-Khu phố 3-Phú Sơn solidarity group, which consists of four members. This is Lưu’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Lưu faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Lưu hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase more dry food to resell.

loans.name: Gumercindo

texts.es:
Gumercindo tiene 50 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico junto a su esposa y sus 04 hijos; pero tiene dos hijos mas los cuales ya se independizaron. El domicilio de Gumercindo se ubica en el Caserío MINAS aproximadamente a 2 hora del distrito de Pucará en la provincia de Jaén – dpto: Cajamarca. La comunidad donde vive el cliente es una pequeña zona rural donde los habitantes se conocen y dan buenas referencias del señor Gumercindo.

La actividad que realiza Gumercindo es la de sembrar café de la variedad Catimor. El préstamo lo utilizará para invertir en mantenimiento del terreno cultivable. Esta inversión le permitirá mejorar la calidad de su producto lo que le permitirá venderlo a un buen precio, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Gumercindo is 50 years old. He lives in his own house, made from rustic materials, with his wife and their 4 children, but he has 2 more children who are already on their own. Gumercindo's house is located in the community of Minas, approximately 2 hours from the district of Pucará in the province of Jaén, department of  Cajamarca. The community where he lives is a small rural area where the residents know each other and give good references for Gumercindo.

Gumercindo's activity is growing the Catimor variety of coffee. He will use the loan to invest in doing maintenance on his arable land. This investment will allow him to invest in improving the quality of his product and will allow him to sell it at a good price. This will allow him to improve his income in the short term, increase his profits and therefore improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in maintenance of the arable land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in her business buying products that allow her to generate more income for her family as this is her only sustenance.

loans.name: Marina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marina, de 45 años de edad, está acompañada, su pareja trabaja de albañil, tiene 3 hijos que viven en su casa y están estudiando.- Además, con ella viven 2 nietos, en total cinco personas dependen de ella. 

Marina, trabaja en la agricultura y también trabaja con ganado bovino, lo ha hecho por más de 8 años, trabajo que aprendió de su esposo, decidió trabajar para obtener un ingreso adicional, antes solo se dedicaba a oficios domésticos.

Ella ocupará el préstamo para cosechar lo que ha sembrado,  ellos podrán recoger su cosecha sin dificultad y tendrán alimento a tiempo para su familia.

Marina, sueña son seguir trabajando como hasta ahora lo ha hecho, para que sus hijos estudien y se preparen académicamente.
texts.en:
Marina, 45 years old, is partnered, her partner works as a bricklayer, and she has 3 children who live in her house and are students. In addition, 2 grandchildren live with her. In all, five people depend on her. 

Marina works in agriculture and also works with cattle, which she has done for more than 8 years, work that she learned from her partner. She decided to work to get additional income; before she only worked taking care of the household tasks. 

She will use the loan to harvest what she has planted. They will be able to collect the harvest without difficulty and will have food in time for her family.

Marina dreams of continuing working as she has been up to now, so that her children go to school and prepare themselves academically.

loans.use: to harvest what she has planted.

loans.name: Safiya

texts.en:
Safiya is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Safiya joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for her children: Yushau, Salomi and Yahaya.  

Before she became a Babban Gona member, Safiya would have had to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for her immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Safiya can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Safiya spoke of her ambition to use the additional income to educate her children, eventually hoping to ensure her children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: To pay for school fees and uniforms; eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Irimiya

texts.en:
Irimiya is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Irimiya joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children: Favour, Sule and Gambo.  

Before he became a Babban Gona member, Irimiya would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Irimiya can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Irimiya spoke of his  ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to make more money for himself and his family.

loans.use: to pay for school fees and uniforms thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Saratu

texts.en:
Saratu is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Saratu joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for her children: Livingstone and Danasabe.  

Before she became a Babban Gona member, Saratu would have had to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for her immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Saratu can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Saratu  spoke of her  ambition to use the additional income to educate her children, eventually hoping to make more money for herself and her family.

loans.use: to pay for school fees and uniforms thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Matha

texts.en:
Matha is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Matha joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for her children: Godiya and Mika.  

Before she became a Babban Gona member, Matha would have had to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for her immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Matha can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Matha  spoke of her ambition to use the additional income to educate her children, eventually hoping to make more money for herself and her family.

loans.use: to pay for her children's school fees and uniforms thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel de 59 años de edad, solamente estudio segundo grado, esta acompañada, ella vive junto a sus 4 nietas y también cuida a su madre que esta mal de salud desde hace dos meses.

Maribel se dedica al destazo de res desde hace 18 años, aprendió el negocio gracias a que una vecina se iba del lugar y decidió aprender. Antes trabajaba en la unidad de salud.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar reses (animales) para destazarlos. Ahora que hay bastante demanda en el comercio de carne fresca.

 Ella desea que sus nietos se gradúen, ya que la primera se graduá este año de enfermera y ella seguirá con el negocio del destazo mientras pueda.
texts.en:
Maribel, 59, could only study up to the second grade. She is in a relationship and lives with her four granddaughters. She also takes care of her mother, who has been sick for two months. Maribel has worked as a butcher for eighteen years. She learned this activity from a neighbor who was leaving, so she decided to learn. Before that, she worked at the health center.

She is requesting a loan to buy cows to butcher, now that there is a high demand for fresh meat in the market. She wants to see her grandchildren receive a degree. The oldest one will receive her degree in nursing this year. She will continue to work as a butcher as long as she can.

loans.use: to buy cows to butcher.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
Raquel de 33 años de edad, es bachiller, su esposo trabaja como sargento en la fuerza armada, son padres de dos hijas que estudian.

 Ella antes de casarse se dedicaba al comercio de ropa, pero luego de casarse decidió dedicarse al hogar y a sus hijas, pero ahora que sus hijas estudian quiere invertir su tiempo y poner a trabajar su conocimiento.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar ropa y seguir comercializando, ella esta dispuesta a apoyar a sus hijas en lo que quieran estudiar, ya que una de ellas quiere ser enfermera, ella esta muy contenta con eso, porque ve que sus hijas tienen convicción de lo que quieren ser y sueña con verlas lograr sus sueños.
texts.en:
Raquel is 33 years old. She finished high school and her husband is a sergeant of the army. They have two daughters that go to school. Before she got married, she worked selling clothes. However, when she got married she decided to work taking care of her daughters and of the household chores. Now that her daughters go to school, she wants to make good use of her time and knowledge.

Raquel is requesting a loan to buy clothes to sell. She is committed to supporting her daughters’ studies, regardless of what they choose to study. One of them wants to become a nurse, which makes her happy because she sees that her daughters know what they want to be in the future. She dreams of seeing them achieve their goals.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando de 50 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo año de secundaria, está felizmente casado, vive junto con su esposa y sus 3  hijos.

Fernando se dedica a la venta informal de productos derivados de la leche, como lo son queso fresco, duro blando, cuajada, quesillo y requesón. El oficio lo maneja bien, porque él trabajó en una quesera y tiene experiencia en manejos de precios de dichos productos, el producto lo compra en la quesera y sale a venderlo desde horas tempranas del día a diferentes lugares de la ciudad, usando como transporte una bicicleta.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar queso, crema, requesón, guajada, arreglar y pintar su bicicleta, lo cual le dará mayor seguridad en su transporte.

Fernando sueña con incrementar su negocio de modo que pueda llegar a tener   empleados que trabajen para él y así obtener mayores ingresos que lo lleven a mejorar su vivienda y gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fernando, 50 years old, went to school up to the second year of secondary school, he is happily married and lives with his wife and their 3 children.

Fernando works in informal sales of products derived from milk, such as farmer's cheese, curd, cream cheese, and cottage cheese. He does this work well because he worked in a cheese factory and has experience in managing the prices of these products. He purchases the products in the cheese factory and goes to sell them from the early hours of the day to different places in the city, using a bicycle for transportation.

The loan that he is requesting is to purchase cheese, cream, cottage cheese, curd and to fix and paint his bicycle, which will provide better security in his transportation.

Fernando dreams of expanding his business so that he can have employees who work for him and get more income which will bring him to improve his house and enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase cheese, cream, cottage cheese, curd and to fix and paint his bicycle, which will provide better security in his transportation.

loans.name: Yuris Alexis

texts.es:
Yuris, de 29 años de edad, estudió hasta primer año de bachillerato, está casado y su esposa trabaja en los oficios domésticos y los fines de semana prepara venta de comida, tiene dos hijos.

Yuris, tiene negocio de ganado bovino, trabajo que ha realizado por un año y lo aprendió de una tía.- Decidió dedicarse a este negocio porque obtiene buen margen de ganancias, también tiene un taller de carpintería.

Anteriormente, era empleado de una carpintería, pero decidió formar su propia carpintería.- El potrero está ubicado a 2 kilómetros de su casa, por otro lado, el taller lo tiene en su casa en donde le apoya su esposa.

Yuris, ocupará el crédito para comprar ganado de repasto, el espera que este negocio mejore su calidad y condición de vida.

El sueña con tener una ganadería grande en donde pueda vender productos lácteos y generar ingresos adicionales para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Yuris, 29 years old, went to school up to the first year of secondary school. He is married and his wife works in the household tasks and on the weekends makes and sells food. He has two children.

Yuris has a cattle business, work that he has done for a year and learned from an aunt. He decided to work in this business because he gets a good margin of earnings, and also has a carpentry shop. 

Previously, he was an employee in a carpentry shop, but he decided to make his own carpentry shop. The pasture is located 2 kilometers from his house, on the other hand, the workshop is located in his house where he has his wife's support. 

Yuris will use the loan to purchase cattle; he hopes that this business will improve his quality and condition of life.

He dreams of having a large cattle business where he can sell dairy products and make additional income to sustain his family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Nhóm 06 Minh Thịnh Minh Lộc Group

texts.en:
Quyến is 45 years old and is married with four children. She is applying for a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Quyến is the group leader of the Nhóm 06 Minh Thịnh Minh Lộc solidarity group, which consists of three members.

This is Quyến’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Quyến has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Quyến hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in her business to be able to sell in the last month of the year and capture the sales movements.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es:
Jesús tiene 36 años de edad, vive en casa alquilada de material rustico junto a su esposa y 01 hijo bebe en el distrito de Querocotillo una comunidad de clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza Jesús es a la venta de productos de primera necesidad(arroz, azúcar, etc.) y además se dedica al cultivo de café. El préstamo lo utilizará para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para poder surtir su tienda y así satisfacer las diferentes necesidades y preferencias de su público consumidor. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jesús is 36 years old. He lives in a rented house made of rustic materials along with his wife and baby son in the district of Querocotillo, a community with a varied climate. Its population works in agriculture, commerce, and livestock raising. It is located in the province of Cutervo, which belongs to the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru.

Jesús sells products of basic necessity, such as rice and sugar. He also works growing coffee. He will use this loan to buy supplies for his store and be able to fulfill the different needs and preferences of his customers. In the short term, this will help him to increase his income by making more profits. This will result in better living conditions for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his store.

loans.name: Ysabel Rosa

texts.es:
Ysabel Rosa tiene 50 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente. Vive con su familia, cuenta con servicios públicos (agua y luz). Ysabel Rosa vive en el distrito de Buenos Aires a 25 minutos de Morropon, desde hace 15 años. La comunidad es pequeña los pobladores se dedican a la crianza de ganado vacuno y al comercio de plátano.

La actividad que desarrolla Ysabel Rosa es la venta de productos de primera necesidad (arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros) estos los realiza en su casa, tiene varios años de experiencia en el rubro, además de la venta de bebidas (gaseosas, aguas y refrescos). Su esposo se dedica a la produccion y comercializacion de platano. El destino del crédito será para invertir en su tienda comprando una mayor mercadería (arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros) para poder aumentar y diversificar su stock de productos esto le permitirá incrementar sus ventas y su excedente, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ysabel Rosa is 50 years old, her legal status is partnered. She lives with her family and has utilities (water and electricity). Ysabel Rosa has lived in the district of Buenos Aires, 25 minutes from Morropon, for the past 15 years. The community is small and the inhabitants work in raising cattle and in selling bananas. 

The work that Ysabel Rosa does is selling staple products (rice, sugar, and oil, among others). She does this in her house, she has some years of experience in this field, in addition she sells drinks (soft drinks, water, and cold drinks). Her partner works growing and selling bananas. This loan will be destined to invest in the store, purchasing more merchandise (rice, sugar, and oil, among others) to be able to increase and diversify her stock of products. This will allow her to increase her sales and her surplus, which will allow her in the short-term to improve her income, increase her earnings, and with the end of improving her quality of live and that of her family.

loans.use: to invest in her store, buying more merchandise (rice, sugar, and oil, among others) to be able to increase and diversify her stock of products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sand, stone and cement.

loans.name: Gabor

texts.en:
Gabor is from Beregovo. He works in the farming sphere, owning a few greenhouses. Along with his wife and a newborn baby, he lives in a small, one-floor house. This house was badly damaged in 2001 due to the flood. However, Gabor's parents managed to restore it as well as they could. 
Gabor is hoping to change windows and doors and to insulate the walls of his house to save on electricity and heating bills in the winter season. The total amount of these improvements is estimated at around 40,000 Hryvnias.

loans.use: to change windows and doors and to insulate the walls of his house

loans.name: Erica

texts.en:
Erica is from Vinogradovo. She is divorced, taking care of a son and a daughter. Along with Erica's children and elderly mother, the family of Erica's sister also lives with them due to financial problems in the family and no ability to rent a separate place to live. 

Erica works as a hair stylist, but she is not officially employed. She rents a facility that serves as her working spot. Erica used to work in a banking institution, however, she was downsized and had to look for ways to support herself and her children.  

Erica is requesting 30 000 Grivnyas (UAH) to install five new windows as well as entrance doors in her own private house. Erica has been dreaming about her own place to live with children for quite awhile. Finally this time is no longer far away, and Erica wants to get everything ready for her family to move in. 

Erica is planning to continue growing her small business, expanding her range of services, and attracting new clients.

loans.use: to install five new windows as well as entrance doors in her own private house

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca es una señora de 48 años de edad, madre soltera de dos hijos que estudian en la universidad.
Habita en la comunidad El Bordo ubicado a 40 kilómetros del municipio de El Sauce donde ha vivido toda su vida al lado de su madre y de sus hijos.
Se gana la vida laborando como maestra de primaria, profesión que ha ejercido por más de 25 años.
A pesar de tener un bajo salario y no tener el apoyo del padre de sus hijos se ha sacrificado por muchos años para prepararlos profesionalmente los cuales estudian diferentes carreras.
Uno de sus grandes sueños es verlos como profesionales y que encuentren un buen trabajo para que sean independientes.
En este momento doña Francisca tiene la necesidad de un crédito para comprar una computadora portátil para su hija que estudia la carrera de Ingeniería en Sistema, lo cual es una herramienta necesaria para sus estudios.
Solicita a Kiva y Ceprodel que le apoyen con este financiamiento, ya que ella no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para llevar a cabo este inversión
texts.en:
Francisca is a 48 year old lady, a single mother, with two children who are university students.

She lives in the community of El Bordo, located 40 kilometers from the municipality of El Sauce where she has lived her whole life alongside her mother and her children. 

She earns her living working as a primary school teacher, a profession she has had for more than 25 years.

Despite having a low salary and not having the support of her children's father, she has sacrificed for many years to prepare them professionally, and they each study different majors. 

One of her greatest dreams is to see them become professionals and find good jobs so that they are independent. 

At this moment, Francisca has the need of a loan to purchase a laptop for her daughter who is studying systems engineering, which is a necessary tool for her studies. 

She asks Kiva and Ceprodel to support her with this loan, since she doesn't have the necessary resources to make this investment.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop.

loans.name: El Arco Group

texts.en:
It is estimated that seven out of every ten people of indigenous descent in Guatemala live in poverty. Especially impacted are households headed by women who suffer from a lack of assets and access to resources. Friendship Bridge, through its “Microcredit Plus Program” that combines small loans and education, is a beacon of hope for over 22,000 impoverished women in Guatemala who are seeking their own solutions to poverty.

Karla, who is 32 years of age, has joined with six other women to form the Friendship Bridge Trust Bank “El Arco” in the town of Chichicastenango. She is married and has three children. Karla is beginning her second loan cycle with the organization and the first with Kiva. Four years ago, she began a snack business that has grown throughout the years. Karla needs additional capital to purchase pots, a blender and other supplies so that she can sell more delicious traditional Guatemalan snack foods like tamales, enchiladas and rellenitos. In Guatemala, “Rellenitos de platano con frijoles” are stuffed plantains with beans and are very delicious. With the additional income from her business, Karla dreams of seeing her children complete their education and lead successful lives.

The women of the “Los Arcos” Trust Bank have various businesses like the fabrication and sale of traditional textiles and handicrafts as well as snack sales. They learn how to successfully manage their loans with educational seminars at their monthly meetings with a Friendship Bridge Loan Officer who teaches them in their own indigenous language, often using games, pictures and role playing. The women gain useful business tools (effective business planning, budgeting, marketing, customer service and pricing), knowledge about nutrition, health and the use of medicinal plants as well as violence against women and sexual education.

Karla and the women in the Trust Bank appreciate the opportunity to secure a loan and learn about the world around them and within them. Kiva investors are valued partners in this effort. Thank you!

loans.use: To purchase pots, a blender and other supplies so that she can sell more delicious traditional Guatemalan snack foods

loans.name: Firas

texts.en:
Firas is a 38-year-old married father of four children, a Syrian citizen who has run his current printing company since April 2013. He has 25 years of experience in this field. He was only 13 years old when he had to quit school and work hard to support his family members. He has a good reputation in his region. He specializes in manufacturing and printing cardboard bags for shops and special occasions. 

Now, Firas is requesting a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to increase his business merchandise with specially requested raw materials for Christmas and New Year's designs. He hopes that in the future he can open a shop specializing in printing tools, materials and machines.

loans.use: To increase his business merchandise with specially requested raw materials for Christmas and New Year's designs

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.en:
Rosenda is 33 years old and has four children. Rosenda is married and all of her children are in school.

Rosenda is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Rosenda requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Rosenda has been farming vegetables for six years now and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosenda would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Warlita

texts.en:
Warlita is 50 years old, married and has seven children. Two of her children are in school.

Warlita is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Warlita requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Warlita has been farming vegetables for 14 years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Warlita would like to save enough money so that she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Shiran

texts.en:
Shiran is a young mother of four who manages a nail design, manicure and pedicure business. Over the last year,she has been dedicated to improving her business management capabilities and her business potential. She worked in a small neighborhood salon, and after participating in business and financial management courses through the Business Association, Shiran is expanding her business and branching out. She has moved her nail design business into a large, centrally located salon, which will allow for a larger customer base and outreach. As part of this move, Shiran needed to purchase specialty gel-based nail lacquer and colors, supplies, equipment and furniture.

Shiran and her husband are both working hard to strengthen economically. Now they are dependent on government subsides, but Shiran is determined to increase her income, move off subsidies and develop a thriving, professional business.

loans.use: To purchase specialty gel-based nail lacquer and colors, supplies, equipment and furniture.

loans.name: Sandra Lorena

texts.es: Sandra de 32 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene tres hijos dos de ellos están estudiando en la escuela de la comunidad, ella estudio hasta 8° grado de educación básica. Sandra es empleada trabaja en un negocio donde venden comida desde hace 4 años, también es comerciante de cosméticos por catálogo. Solicita el préstamo para comprar lociones, pinta uñas, pinta labios y demás para su negocio. Espera mantener estables sus ventas y algún día solo trabajar en lo propio.
texts.en: Sandra, 32 years old, is partnered and has three children, two of whom are students in the community school. She went to school up to the 8th grade. Sandra is an employee and has worked in a business where she sells food for the past 4 years. Also, she sells cosmetics from a catalog. She asks for a loan to purchase lotions, nail polish, lipstick and others for her business. She opes to be able to maintain steady sales and some day only work for herself.

loans.use: to purchase lotions, nail polish, lipstick, and others.

loans.name: Maa Parbati Group

texts.en:
The Maa Parbati Self-Help Group was formed in 2014 by eleven active women of Khajurpada village of Bolangir district in Odisha, India to access a loan from Mahashakti Foundation to expand their existing businesses.

Khajurpada is a very remotely located rural village. Most of the people of this village are poor and depend upon cultivation and labour. But some of the people have adopted other sources of income for development of their families. Hemalata, aged about 38 years, is one of them. The lady standing second from the right in the photo and raising her hand is Hemalata. She lives with her husband, two daughters, and one son. Two of her children, except the elder daughter, are continuing their study in the local school.

Hemalata has been running a small general shop in her house for the last ten years with the help of her husband. She sells general grocery items such as rice, oil, sugar, tea, soap, washing powder, lentils, biscuits, soft drinks, toffees, eggs, etc. All types of daily need items are available in her store.

Apart from this, she also sells milk from her two milking cows. Her net monthly income from the existing business is Rs. 6,000. Out of this income, she hardly manages all her business, education, and domestic expenses.

Hemalata has so many dreams, but due to her scanty income she could not even think to fulfill these. Therefore, she wants to increase her income by expanding her milk-selling business. As there is more demand for milk in the nearby town of ten kilometers away, Hemalata is planning to buy another cow with the present loan. She feels that this will add some extra income to her present income.

Hemalata dreams to provide better education to her children, as well as the marriage of her elder daughter in a respectable manner.

The other ten members of the group are also doing small enterprises such as milk-selling, procurement of paddy, and running a tiffin stall.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a vehicle.

loans.name: Valeriya

texts.en:
Valeriya is retired. She is a widow with two grown children. The death of Valeriya's husband five years ago affected her very badly; she had a nervous breakdown and had to spend a certain amount of time in the hospital. However, she still runs her small business of a tiny grocery store in the yard of her house. 

Valeriya wants to reconstruct her bathroom, tearing the walls down and expanding the kitchen space. She also wants to change entrance doors and two windows to save on heating expenses. Valeriya needs an additional 40,000 UAH to afford this reconstruction of her house.

loans.use: to reconstruct her bathroom, tearing the walls down and expanding the kitchen space

loans.name: Alicia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Alicia del socorro tiene la edad de 33 años, madre soltera de dos niños en edad escolar, también tiene a cargo a su madre la cual le cuida a sus hijos mientras ella trabaja.
Habita en la comarca El Tamarindo ubicada a la orilla de un inmenso rio llamado por el mismo nombre a 40 kilómetros del municipio de El Sauce.
Alicia con gran esfuerzo se preparó como maestra de primaria y actualmente imparte clases a niños de primer nivel, profesión que le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.
Esta joven con gran sacrificio ha formado y criado a sus hijos sola sin la ayuda del padre y se siente muy orgullosa de ellos.
Alicia se dio cuenta por medio de unas compañeras de trabajo que hay unas personas del extranjero llamados Kiva que apoyan al más pobre y necesitado por medio de Ceprodel y tal es su caso, en estos momentos ella necesita de una mano amiga para poder mejorar su salud, por lo cual necesita de un préstamo para comprar medicamentos y realizarse exámenes.
texts.en:
Alicia del Socorro is 33 years old and a single mother. She has two children of school age. She also takes care of her mother, who helps her with her children while she is at work. Alicia lives in a village called El Tamarindo, located by a huge river with the same name. This place is located 40 km [25 miles] from the municipality of El Sauce.

Thanks to her hard work, she became a primary school teacher. She teaches first grade and this activity helps her to sustain her family. She has worked hard to raise her children without their father’s help, and she feels very proud of them.

Alicia heard from her colleagues that there is a group of foreigners called Kiva who help poor people through Ceprodel. She needs a friendly hand in order to take care of her health. She is requesting a loan to buy medicines and pay for some medical tests.

loans.use: to buy medicines and pay for some medical tests.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.en:
Ivan is from Vinogradovo. He works as a taxi driver, offering transportation services. He has been working in this sphere for 7 years. Ivan is married for the second time and has a son. His elderly mother lives with his family as well. Ivan loves his job. Along with the transportation services that he offers, he also grows berries in the summer. 
Ivan needs an additional 15,000 Hryvnias to remodel his bathroom and his entryway. He is planning to invest this money in the facing, plastering, and painting of walls, as well as in covering the floors with ceramic tiles. All of these improvements are meant to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to remodel his bathroom and his entryway

loans.name: Anselma

texts.en:
Anselma is 28 years old and has three children. Anselma is married and all of her children are in school.

Anselma is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Anselma requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Anselma has been farming vegetables for 13 years now and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Anselma would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Jorge Mauricio

texts.es:
Jorge de 53 años de edad, es agricultor y está casado, el estudio hasta 7° grado de educación básica, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen un hijo que estudia en la escuela de la comunidad.Jorge es agricultor trabaja en la siembra de maíz frijol y además es productor ganadero

Solicita el préstamo para comprar ganado para su negocio y aspira a tener el ganado suficiente como para dejar a su familia una buena fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Jorge is 53 years old, he is a farmer and he is married. He studied up until the 7th grade of basic education. His wife dedicates herself to the household chores, and they have a child that attends the community school. Jorge is a farmer, and he works planting corn and beans and also as a cattle rancher.

He is requesting a loan to buy cattle for his business, and he aspires to have enough cattle so he could leave his family a good source of income.

loans.use: to buy cattle for his business.

loans.name: Welchita

texts.en:
Welchita is 60 years old and married with seven children. Two of her children are in school; she is a very hard working entrepreneur.   

Welchita has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. Welchita requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more blouses, bags, footwear and other ready-to-wear clothing.

Welchita has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Welchita would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more blouses, bags, footwear and other ready-to-wear clothing

loans.name: Lara

texts.en:
Lara is 44 years old and married with six children. Three of her children are still in school.

Lara works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more items like bread, canned goods, soft-drinks and other groceries.

Lara has previously borrowed, and repaid, nine loans from NWTF. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from gasoline retailing.

Lara aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items like bread, canned goods, soft-drinks and other groceries.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio tiene 44 años de edad, es conviviente, vive en casa propia, natural de la zona. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería como sustento principal, siembra y cosecha de banano,maíz, fréjol caupí. Etc. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Julio es comercio de platano y venta de creveza, chicha y harina de maiz, además de la venta de chicha de jora, actividad que realiza desde hace más de 5 años, con experiencia en el negocio, con muy buenas referencias en la zona. Julio cuenta con capacidad de pago. El destino del crédito será para invertirlo en mejoras de vivienda y compra de mercadería para negocio(cerveza), ya que se acercan la fiestas navideñas y la demanda subirá por esta temporada. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas devido al crecimiento económico de la zona
texts.en:
Julio is 44 years old, partnered, lives in his own house, and is a native of the area. Life in the district is peaceful, its inhabitants work in agriculture and raising animals as their primary sustenance, and plant and harvest bananas, corn, cowpeas, etc. His community is located in the district and province of Morropón, in Piura region, on the northern coast of Perú.

The work he does is growing bananas and selling beer, chicha [a fermented corn drink] and corn flour, and in addition he sells chicha de jora [corn beer], work he has done for the past 5 years, with experience in the business, with very good local references. Julio has the ability to pay. The loan will be destined to be invested in improving the house and purchasing merchandise for his business (beer), since the Christmas holidays approach and the demand will increase in this season. The market shows good prospects due to the economic growth of the region.

loans.use: to invest in improvements to his house and merchandise for his business (beer).

loans.name: Yelena

texts.en:
Yelena is 56, and she is retired. Along with her husband, she has lived in a private house in Zaporozhye since 2006. Not long ago they made an addition to their house, building a kitchen and a corridor to it. However, they couldn't finish the construction project because they didn't have enough finances to install windows and plaster the walls in the new addition. 
Yelena is hoping to invest 10,000 Hryvnias from Kiva into finishing construction in the kitchen and corridor of her home. She has been dreaming about owning a private house for her entire life. She wanted to have a small garden, flowers, and an orchard. Now Yelena is willing and ready to invest all her energy in improvements in her house.

loans.use: to install windows and to plaster the walls in the kitchen and corridor of her home

loans.name: Fredys Isaias

texts.es: Fredys de 25 años de edad, esta acompañado, estudio hasta 3er grado de educación básica, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos aun no tienen hijos. Él es empleado de la alcaldía  municipal de la ciudad y es agricultor por herencia de su padre. Solicita el préstamo para reparar su motocicleta que es su medio de transporte para llegar al trabajo. Fredys Sueña con tener una familia y trabajar duro para que nunca le falte nada.
texts.en: Fredys is 25 years old, partnered, and went to school up to the 3rd grade. His wife takes care of the household tasks and they don't have any children yet. He is an employee in the municipal government of the city and is a farmer, inherited from his father. He asks for a loan to repair his motorcycle which is his mode of transport to get to work. Fredys dreams of having a family and working hard so that they never lack anything.

loans.use: to repair his motorcycle which is his means of transport to get to work.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 41 years old and married with two children, both of whom are in school.

Alma works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Alma has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from fruit vending.

Alma aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en: Leonisa is a 53-year-old married woman and a mother of six. Most of her children are adults, and her youngest is thirteen. She and her family live in Carles, Iloilo. Leonisa has been engaged in the fishing business for twenty-one years. She supports her husband, who is a fisherman and a carpenter. Leonisa is asking for a loan to buy ten sets of fishing nets to increase their catch. Through this, her husband will be able to increase his daily catch, thus giving them more fish to sell in the market. Leonisa dreams of improving their livelihood and renovating her house.

loans.use: to buy ten sets of fishing nets to increase their catch

loans.name: Cristhian

texts.es:
Cristhian es de la ciudad de San lorenzo, esta cursando el segundo año en la carrera de Ciencias Contables, él esta trabajando en las Fuerzas Armadas, comenta que cuando se reciba tiene pensado abrir un estudio Contable en forma paralela en su actividad de militar, para poder seguir creciendo como persona y profesional.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad y seguir estudiando.
texts.en: Cristhian is from the city of San Lorenzo and is in his second year of studies in the Accounting Sciences program. He is working in the Armed Forces, and says that when he receives his degree he intends to open an accounting studio alongside his military activity to be able to keep growing as a person and as a professional. He is asking for this loan to be able to pay his university fees and keep studying.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Brenda

texts.en: Brenda, 56 years old is a woman from Carles, Iloilo. She is married to a fisherman and has one adult son. She learned fishing as their livelihood from her marriage and has been working in fishing alongside her husband for 28 years now. She is asking for a loan to buy gasoline, crude oil, canned goods, chips, bath soap, detergent, candies and rice to increase her inventory. Brenda dreamed of seeing her business succeed with the help of the loan. Any income generated will be for food, savings and business expansion.

loans.use: to buy gasoline, crude oil, canned goods, chips, bath soap, detergent, candies and rice

loans.name: Karen Vanessa

texts.es:
Karen de 21 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo año de bachillerato, está casada y su esposo es agricultor, tiene dos hijos que  aún no estudian, ella es ama de casa, pero también apoya a su esposo en los trabajos agrícolas.

 Solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como golosinas, granos básicos, productos de higiene personal, de cocina y demás  para iniciar tienda, empezara con poco y planea hacerse de mas poco a poco, sueña con tener un negocio y hacerlo grande para tener una buena fuente de ingreso.
texts.en:
Karen, 21 years old, studied until the second year of high school.  She is married, and her husband is a farmer.  She has two children that are not in school yet.  She is a housewife, but also supports her husband in his agricultural jobs.

She is requesting the loan to buy products such as sweets, grains, personal hygiene products, kitchen things, and other things to start a store.  She will begin with little and she plans to make more little by little.  She dreams of having a business and making it bigger to have a good source of income.

loans.use: To buy products such as sweets, grains, personal hygiene products, kitchen things, and other things to start a store.

loans.name: Glory Elizabet

texts.es:
Glory Elizabet tiene 28 años de edad, su estado civil es soltera, vive en casa familiar el distrito de La Matanza. La vida en el distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente debido a que en lo que respecta al negocio u a otra actividad que se desarrollan sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería y crianza de animales,comercio de arroz, comercio de ganado vacuno etc. Ubicada en la provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Glory Elizabet es a la venta de cerveza, chicha de jora, clarito y piqueos. La actividad la realiza desde hace más de 6 meses, en el distrito donde vive. El destino del crédito será para invertir en su negocio, pues desea comprar mayores cantidades de cerveza, y de harina(materia prima de producción de la chicha). Glory Elizabet piensa trabajar otorgando buen producto que le permita a un corto plazo incrementar sus ventas y seguir implementando su negocio. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas debido a que el producto es muy comercial en la zona y se vende de manera semanal .
texts.en:
Glory Elizabet is 28 years old, her legal status is single, and she lives in the family home in the district of La Matanza. Life in the district goes along peacefully since in regards to business or other work that the inhabitants do, they work in agriculture, animal husbandry, and raising animals, selling rice, selling cattle, etc. It is located in Morropón province, in the region of Piura, on the northern coast of Perú. 

The work that Glory Elizabet does is selling beer, chicha de jora [corn beer], clarito [a kind of dry martini], and snacks.

She has done this work for over 6 months, in the district where she lives. The loan will be destined to invest in her business, since she wants to purchase more quantities of beer and flour (the raw material to make chicha). Glory Elizabet plans to work offering a good product that will allow her in the short term to increase her sales and continue running her business. The market presents good prospects due to the product being very commercial in the area and is sold weekly.

loans.use: to invest in her business since she wants to purchase more quantities of beer and of flour (raw material to make chicha).

loans.name: Blanca Soledad

texts.es:
Blanca Soledad tiene 31 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 1 hijo, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Blanca Soledad se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en su domicilio, ella solicita préstamo para mejoramiento de infraestructura donde se encuentran sus animales, para poder criarlos en condiciones óptimas; dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones de calidad a sus animales, con gran influencia en el negocio; Blanca Soledad piensa mejorar productividad de los animales para poder atender las diversas necesidades y gustos de los clientes de la zona.Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca Soledad is 31 years old, is married, and has one son.  She lives with her family in a rural area in the Oyotún district, in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, on the northern coast of Perú.  Her community makes a living primarily in agriculture, livestock, and trade.

Blanca Soledad makes a living breeding and selling animals.  With more than 10 years of experience in the business, the same place where her house is located, she is requesting a loan for infrastructure improvements where she keeps her animals to be able to raise them in optimal conditions.  Said loan will allow her to have better quality conditions for her animals, with a big influence on the business.  

Blanca Soledad plans to improve the productivity of the animals to be able to attend to the diverse needs and tastes of the customers in the area.  It will allow her in a short time to improve her income, increase her profits, and thus improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: To improve the infrastructure where she keeps her animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more supplies to sell in her store.

loans.name: Adan Bladimir

texts.es:
Adán, de 27 años de edad, se graduó hace tres años de bachiller, tuvo que realizar un gran esfuerzo pues viajaba todos los días en bus para llegar a la escuela.- Los fines de semana tenia que trabajar para cubrir sus propios gastos y de esta manera ayudaba a su madre. De Adán dependen económicamente su madre y su hermana.

Actualmente, trabaja de vendedor en una ferretería en donde tiene tres años de laborar, cuando salio de estudiar le dieron la oportunidad de trabajar en esta ferretería en la ciudad, viaja todos los días media hora en bus, tiene que levantarse a las cuatro y media de la mañana para estar temprano en el lugar de trabajo.- Antes trabajó en una panadería durante dos años.

Adán, solicita el crédito en la institución para instalar una puerta en su vivienda ya que la que tiene esta dañada.- La puerta está valorada en $350.00, el resto lo necesita para comprar una maquina de cocer para su madre ya que ella trabaja en la sastrería. De esta manera el espera vivir con su familia en una vivienda mucho mas segura, ademas, desea que su madre pueda trabajar en una maquina que este en  mejores condiciones.

El sueño de el es, ir a la universidad, porque su gran deseo es ser arquitecto, pues le encanta dibujar y pintar.- El quiere seguir apoyando a su familia es por ello que continuará trabajando.
texts.en:
Adán is 27 years old. He graduated 3 years ago from high school. He had to make a great effort to attend school, traveling by bus every day to arrive. On weekends he had to work to cover his own expenses and in this way he helped his mother as well. Adan's mother and sister depend on him economically. Today he works as a vendor in a hardware store. He has worked there for 3 years. When he left to study they gave him the opportunity to work in that hardware store in the city. He traveled every day 30 minutes by bus, waking up at 4:30 AM to arrive to work on time. Previously he worked in a bakery for 2 years.

Adan seeks a loan to install a door on his home as the one currently in place is damaged. The door is valued at $350.00. The rest of the loan will be used to buy a sewing machine for his mother as she works as a seamstress. In this way he hopes to live with his family in a much more secure home. In addition, he hopes that his mother can work on her machine in better conditions. His dream is to go to the university because his greatest desire is to be an architect as he really enjoys drawing and painting. He wants to continue supporting his family and it is for them that he will continue working.

loans.use: to install a door on his home and to buy a sewing machine for his mother.

loans.name: Yusuf

texts.en:
Yusuf is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Yusuf would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater for his immediate cash needs.

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Yusuf can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest.

When asked about his goals, Yusuf expressed a desire to use the extra income to build a better home, and in the long run, become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell his corn at low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Sani

texts.en:
Sani is a maize farmer from Koda Gora village in Kaduna state. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Sani would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater for his immediate cash needs.

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Sani can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest.

Sani, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to expand his farmland, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell his corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Ji

texts.en:
Ji is originally from South Korea and now lives in Virginia with her husband. For almost five years now, she has owned and operated a mall jewelry kiosk. Ji has worked in few different locations and is currently in the Virginia Beach area. She sells a full range of hair accessories, from hair barrettes and combs to synthetic fiber hair extensions. Ji is especially proud of the high quality, hand-made barrettes she sells.

Ji is pictured in front of her kiosk, with great examples of the products she sells!

In order to stay current with the latest trends and styles her customers want, Ji needs a loan to purchase inventory. She will use the loan to buy more hair accessories, including more of the hand-made barrettes pictured. Ji knows she needs to have what her customers are looking for – that special hair piece that will complete an outfit. In the future, she hopes to run a wholesale store.

loans.use: to purchase inventory for her jewelry kiosk

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina es una persona que se esfuerza por poder salir adelante, esta estudiando la carrera de ciencias contables, y por medio de esa carrera quiere poder ayudar a las personas.
Pide este prestamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando por cumplir sus metas y objetivos.
texts.en: Cristina is someone who strives to get ahead. She is studying for a degree in accounting sciences, and she wants to be able to help people through this work. She is asking for this loan to be able to pay her university fees and thus keep striving to achieve her goals and objectives.

loans.use: to pay university fees

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
Liz es de la ciudad de Encarnación, está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad a la vez que trabaja de secretaria hace más de un año.
Actualmente está en el último año de la carrera, su principal objetivo es terminar su carrera y trabajar en forma independiente, para no tener que depender de nadie más.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas, que le será muy útil.
texts.en:
Liz is from the city of Encarnación, she is studying the profession of accounting, and at the same time she has worked as a secretary for more than one year. She is currently in the final year of her degree. Her main objective is to finish her degree and work independently so she does not have to depend on anyone else.

She is requesting a loan to be able to invest it in paying her tuition, which will be very helpful to her.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia tiene 27 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Julia se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, como patos, gallos, pollos, gallinas, cuyes, etc; con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio, él solicita préstamo para compra de una cantidad mayor de animales, para poder aumentar y diversificar su stock para poder tener mayor variedad y productividad en animales, con gran influencia en el negocio; Julia piensa incrementar su stock de animales para poder atender las diversas gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Julia is 27 years old, she has a partner, and has 2 children. She lives with her family in a rural zone in the Oyotún district in the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region of the northern coast of Peru. Her community is basically dedicated to farming, livestock, and trade.

Julia earns a living raising and selling animals such as ducks, roosters, chickens, hens, guinea pigs, etc. She has more than 10 years of experience in the trade. Her business is located at her own home. She is requesting the loan to buy a larger quantity of animals to increase and diversify her stock and have a greater variety and productivity of animals with a large influence in the business. 

Julia is thinking about increasing her stock of animals to be able to appeal to the diverse wants and needs of the customers in the area. This will allow her to improve her revenues in the short term, increase her profits, and ultimately improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of animals to increase and diversify her stock and have a greater variety and productivity of animals

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 63 años de edad, vive en casa propia con hermanos (generan sus propios ingresos). Santos cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales. De familia unida. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería. Ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Santos se dedica a la cría y venta de animales menores (pavos, patos, gallinas) desde hace aproximadamente más de 10 años. En el distrito de Cayaltí. El destino del préstamo es para compra de animales en una mayor cantidad y diversidad; y arreglo de corral, para poder criarlos en mejores condiciones y mayor calidad para poder venderlos a un buen precio. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 63 years old and lives in his own house with his siblings (they generate their own income). Santos has good personal and work references. They are a close family. He lives in a community dedicated to trade, agriculture, and animal husbandry, located in the district of Cayaltí, in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Perú.

Santos has worked raising and selling small animals (turkeys, ducks, hens) for more than approximately 10 years in the district of Cayaltí. The loan is destined to purchase a greater quantity and diversity of animals, and to fix the pen, to be able to raise them in better conditions and with better quality to be able to sell them at a good price. This will allow him the the short term to improve his income, increase his earnings, and in the end, improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quantity and diversity of animals and to repair the pen.

loans.name: Jairo

texts.es:
Jairo tiene 42 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de sus hijos, vive en casa propia de material rustico de un piso ubicada en el Caserio Santa Rosa, Jairo es nacido en caserio Santa Rosa, él se lleva bien con los miembros de su sector, caserio; Jairo cuenta con buenas referencias personales ycomerciales en la zona, vivienda cuenta con servicios de agua. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de Santo Tomás, provincia de Cutervo, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Jairo es el cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 2 has. Variedad catimor resistente a enfermedades, plantación esta en su segundo año de producción tiene 3 años de edad, cultiva café de la variedad Catimor, actividad la realiza desde hace 4 años, cuenta con experiencia en el rubro del cultivo de cafe. Adicionalmente cria animales menores (gallinas, cuyes, chanchos y otros), cultivo de productos de pan llevar, cria de gando vacuno. El destino del crédito será para mantenimiento y cultivo de 2 has. De café en fase de brote floral, asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2015, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendra mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jairo is 42 years old, has a stable household alongside his children, and lives in his own one-story house made of rustic material in the village of Santa Rosa, Jairo. He was born in the village of Santa Rosa and he gets along well with the members of his area, village. Jairo has good personal and business references in the zone, and his house has running water. His community is located in the district of Santo Tomás, Cutervo province, in the region of Cajamarck in the northern mountains of Perú. 

The work Jairo does is growing coffee, to date he has 2 hectares of the Catimor variety, resistant to disease. The plantation is in its second year of production and is 3 years old. He grows the Catimor variety of coffee, work he has done for the past 4 years. He has experience in the field of coffee cultivation. Additionally, he raises small animals (hens, guinea pigs, pigs and others), grows grain products, and raises cattle. The loan is destined to the maintenance and cultivation of 2 hectares of coffee in the floral bud burst stage, assuring a good production for the 2015 season, reflecting a greater volume of sales and in the end he will get more income to be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to maintain and cultivate 2 hectares of coffee in the floral bud break stage, assuring a good production for the 2015 season.

loans.name: Jeralyn

texts.en:
Jeralyn sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan has entrenched her business. She was able to purchase additional grocery products needed to increase her product inventory. The loan also helped her provide for the educational expense of her children and pay for their daily needs.

She is very positive that she could improve her business more if you will lend her an amount of 20,000 PHP. This new loan will go to additional stocks of groceries, toiletries and beverages. Her customers will likely to buy more items if she has more of her products displayed in her store. An increase in sales will also result in a significant increase in profit, which will also result in her business becoming viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Aside from her variety store, Jeralyn also operates a utility vehicle for transportation service and she wishes to add more units to increase her profit. She dreams to give her children a good life in the future. She meets every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed for her business.

loans.name: Irma Maricela

texts.es:
Irma 38 años de edad, esta soltera, estudio hasta 9° grado de educación básica, tiene un hijo que estudia en la escuela de la comunidad. Irma es comerciante, es dueña de un comedor en el mercado municipal y cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en su trabajo. 

Solicita el préstamo para cubrir los gastos de graduación de un familiar y para invertir una parte en su negocio. Sueña con hacer crecer su negocio de tal manera que los ingresos basten para mantener a la familia.
texts.en:
Irma is 38 years old, is single, and studied until the 9th grade.  She has a son that studies in the community school.  Irma is a merchant, and she owns a canteen in the municipal market and has 10 years of experience in her job.

She is requesting a loan to cover the costs of the graduation of a family member and to invest a part in her business.  She dreams of making her business grow such that the income will be enough to support the family.

loans.use: To cover the costs of the graduation of a family member and to invest a part in her business.

loans.name: Pedronela

texts.en:
Pedronelan is a business woman. She has been involved in business activities since 2006. She started with her own working capital of $100. 

She is now requesting a loan of $800 from Tuba rai Metin because she wants to improve her business. She is very interested in her business, so she will take this loan to buy more goods such as coffee, biscuits, noodles, candies, aqua, cooking oils, soft drinks, and other things to sell. 

She needs this loan to improve the management of her business and also she hopes to open a bigger store in future.

loans.use: to buy supplies to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees

loans.name: Digno

texts.es:
Digno está estudiando la carrera  de contabilidad y a la vez está trabajando para así cubrir los gastos de facultad y también ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Una de sus metas es terminar su carrera, tener su titulo universitario y así poder ejercer mi profesión.
Comenta que su papá falleció hace un tiempo, y que su mama viajó al exterior por lo que tuvo que pasar por muchas dificultades.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su carrera y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Digno is studying the profession of accounting and at the same time he is working to be able to cover the costs of school and also help his loved ones. One of his goals is to finish his classes, obtain his university degree, and thus be able to practice his profession.

He mentions that his father passed away some time ago, and his mother traveled to the countryside. As a result, he had to go through many difficulties. He is requesting this loan to be able to cover the tuition for his degree and in this way be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Pangkung Lip-Lip Indah Group

texts.en:
Ni Kadek, as the head of Pangkung Lip-Lip Indah Group, manages the payments and makes sure all the processes are done well. Ni Kadek has 2 school-age children, and both of them are still in elementary school. Her husband works as a farmer and also as a mason. She had a loan of 1,500,000 IDR, and she used it to purchase 4 local piglets. Ni Kadek successfully sold them all and earned a satisfactory profit. She used the profit fully to support her children's educational needs.
Now the group proposes a new loan, still for supporting their pig business. Now the price for 1 kg of pork is 34,000 IDR, the most expensive price for pork ever, maybe because it’s nearly Christmas and New Year's. Ni Kadek will use her portion of the loan to purchase 2 piglets and to fatten the pigs. She hopes the price will still remain high for the next 6 months. Ni Kadek and the group are very happy for this special loan because they do not need collateral to have it, but they are very responsible for the payment.
One member could not attend the meeting because of illness.

loans.use: to purchase 2 piglets

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo hails from the community of Carles, Iloilo. He is married with two children, age 8 and 15.
 
Reynaldo buys and sells lumber and charcoal to the people in his town. He started this business last year and it earns him 3,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) per month. He is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy lumber and more charcoal to sell. This will guarantee a better return of investment when he has available goods to offer. 

In the future, he hopes to successfully send his children to school out of his income.

loans.use: to buy charcoal and lumber to sell

loans.name: Jumar

texts.en:
Jumar is a resident of Carles, Iloilo. He is 36 years old and married with four children ages three to twelve. He lives like a single father because his wife works abroad in order to help with the expense of raising their children.  

For a year now, he has been fishing to provide for his children. He is asking for a loan to repair his boat and to buy new fishing nets.

Jumar hopes that someday his family will be living together once again and his wife will not have to go abroad to work. He dreams of improving his business and expanding it to increase his income and profitability. His income will be for his family's daily consumption and school fees of his children.

loans.use: to repair his boat and buy new fishing nets.

loans.name: Roimer

texts.es:
Roimer tiene 26 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de sus hijos, vive en casa propia de material rustico de un piso ubicada el Caserio San Juan Pampa en el distrito Santo Tomas, Roimer es nacido en caserio el Caserio El Pueblo Lo Hizo, el cual pertenece al distrito Santo Tomas, él se lleva bien con los mienbros de su sector, caserío y pobladores del distrito de Santo Tomas; Roimer cuenta con buenas referencias personales y comerciales en la zona, vivienda cuenta con servicios de agua.

La actividad que realiza Roimer es el cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 1 has. Variedad catimor resistente a enfermedades, plantación está en su segundo año de producción tiene 3 años de edad, cultiva café de la variedad Catimor, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 4 años, cuenta con experiencia en el rubro del cultivo de cafe. Adicionalmente cria animales menores (gallinas, cuyes, chanchos y otros), cultivo de productos de pan llevar, trabaja como obrero para la empresa Provias. El destino del crédito será para mantenimiento y cultivo de 1 has. De café en fase de brote floral, asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2015, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendra mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Roimer is 26 years old. He has a stable home with his children. He lives in his own one-story home made from traditional materials in San Juan Pampa area in Santo Tomas district. Roimer is originally from El Pueblo Lo Hizo, in Santo Tomas district. He gets along well with his neighbors in his immediate area as well as the greater area. Roimer has good personal and business references from the zone, an area that has water service.

Roimer grows coffee and to date has a hectare of catimor variety which is resistant to disease. This is his second season of production and his plants are 3 years old. He has been growing coffee for 4 years and has experience growing coffee. Additionally he raises small animals (hens, guinea pigs, pigs, and others). He grows products for bread, and works as a laborer in a business called Provias.

The loan will be used to maintain and cultivate coffee crop in its flowering phrase, assuring a good production for the 2015 harvest. This will be reflected in a greater volume in sales, resulting in greater income so that he can continue to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to maintain and cultivate coffee crop in its flowering phrase, assuring a good production for the 2015 harvest.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new equipment and new stools for her store.

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Romeo is 57 years old, single and a resident of Carles, Iloilo. It is not an easy life for Romeo to live alone, so he works hard to provide for himself through his sari-sari (variety) store business. His business has existed for four years now and is earning 9,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) per month. He is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy chips, toiletries, seasoning, condiments, canned goods, detergent and liquors.

Romeo hopes to increase his business profitability once his inventory increases. In the future, Romeo dreams of becoming a franchiser.

loans.use: to buy chips, toiletries, seasoning, condiments, canned goods, detergent and liquors

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel esta esta estudiando para ser un ingeniero agrónomo, su meta es la de ser un profesional exitoso, como así para ayudar a sus padres, y lograr trabajar dentro de empresas multinacionales para tener buenos ingresos y vivir sin privaciones.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, de manera a seguir luchando por sus sueños como lo viene haceindo.
texts.en:
Daniel is studying to be an agronomist.  His goal is to be a successful professional, as well as to help his parents, and to find a job in Multinational Enterprises to have good income and live free from want.

He is requesting this loan to be able to pay the fees of his degree, so that he can continue fighting for his dreams as he is doing it.

loans.use: To pay university fees.

loans.name: Larissa

texts.es:
Larissa está estudiando contabilidad con  mucha dedicación y esfuerzo, vive con sus padres y comenta que tiene  un negocio de Librería, de aquí a un año su deseo es ejercer su profesión de contadora pública.
Ella es una persona muy luchadora y sacrificada.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera y de esa forma seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Larissa is pursuing a degree in accounting with tremendous dedication and diligence. She lives at home with her parents, and notes that she runs a bookstore. A year ago, Larissa realized that her work on the store had inspired in her the ambition to become a certified public accountant. Larissa is a very tenacious young woman who is willing to make sacrifices. 

She is applying for this loan so that she can pay the fees for her accounting program and continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es de la ciudad de Villarrica, es una persona que se está esforzando para poder salir adelante y ser un profesional exitoso el día de mañana.
El está estudiando para ser médico, y de esa forma poder ayudar a las demás personas en algo tan importante como es la salud.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir su meta.
texts.en:
Francisco is from the city of Villarrica.   He is a person that is striving to be able to get ahead and to be a successful professional tomorrow.  He is studying to be a doctor and thus be able to help others in something as important as health.

He is requesting this loan to be able to invest in paying the fees of his degree and thus be able to continue his goal.

loans.use: To pay university fees.

loans.name: Glory Dewata Group

texts.en:
Accompanied with her husband, Ni Wayan runs a pig business. Her husband is very thorough keeping the pigs. She also has another side job as a farmer. The profit from the pig business is set aside to buy seeds and is also used for savings.

Ni Wayan and the Glory Dewata Group are receiving their third loan with the same members and loan size. The loan will be used to increasing the pig business by purchasing superior piglets, local piglets and feed. Ni Wayan uses her loan to purchase superior feed only because she still has pigs remaining in the cage. Besides using her loan to purchase feed, she also uses it to buy corn seeds for her garden.
